direction.raw_text: - PATIO - EXTERIOR DAY We are in Philip Stuckey's residence on the Hollywood Hills. Apparently, a party is in progress. Close Up on the Magician's hands and the hands of two ladies. The magician is doing tricks with coins in the ladies' hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So let's imagine, ladies, that you're a Savings and Loan officer. Watch. One, two, three. See ? On lady has got three coin in her hand, and the other one only one. The magician takes the three coins from the first lady's hand, and closes it. Then he takes the only coin from the other lady's hand, but leaves it open. He puts the four coins in his hand and closes it. Credits appears in white capital letters on the screen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've got it all, and we've got nothing. And you have all four. Just take a look. He opens his hand, which is empty. Then he opens the first lady's hand, which contains the four coins.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But I wouldn't trust you with real gold. That's why this one's only worth about a penny. He takes one of the coins from the first lady's hand, hides it in his hand, and makes it appears again changed into a huge penny coin. End of the first set of credits.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hmm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And if you wonder where the other one went, watch. His left hand moves to the first lady's' ear, and gets the missing penny out of it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A penny from the ear. How much for the rest ? Philip Stuckey, the host, walks behind the magician. Philip is a short man in his forties, with receding hair. He looks, at the same time, obsequious and domineering. His guests laugh at his joke. Philip moves toward a young man. The camera follows Philip.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Have you seen Edward ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I haven't. Great party, Philip.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, my wife went to a lot of trouble : she called a caterer. He walks to a group of guest gathered around a large buffet table. Behind the table, the balustrade of the patio, and in the background, Hollywood Hills.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me, Ann. Howard, how are you ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Philip, good. Hey, I understand Edward's taking over Morse Industries.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, well, he's not here to get a suntan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can I get in on it ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. Call me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just call me. He turns to another guest and shake hands with him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, hi. I'm Philip Stuckey, Edward Lewis's lawyer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, where's the guest of honor anyway ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, if I know this fellow, he's probably off in a corner somewhere charming a very pretty lady. He turns to a charming lady talking with a man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How are you ? He gives her a kiss.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - STUDY - INTERIOR DAY Very modern design. An artistic picture of a nude girl on the wall. Medium shot of Edward Lewis standing near the desk, talking on the telephone. He is a very handsome man in his early forties. He is very elegantly dressed, apparently with a very expensive suit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I told my secretary to make the arrangements. Didn't she call you ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over on the telephone) Yes, she did. I speak to your secretary more than I speak to you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I see.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over on the telephone) I have my own life too, you know, Edward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is a very important week for me. I need you here. He walks to the large bay window, overlooking Hollywood Hills.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over on the telephone) But you never give me any notice. You just think I'm at your beck and call.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I do not believe that you are at my beck and call.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over on the telephone) Well, that's the way you always make me feel. Maybe I should just move out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If that's what you want, yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over on the telephone) All right, when you get back to New York, we'll discuss it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now is as good a time as any.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over on the telephone) That's fine with me, Edward. Good-bye. She hangs up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good-bye, Jessica. Edward looks down, through the bay window, to the party still going on on the patio on the floor below. We can hear the chatter from the party.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - STAIRWAY - INTERIOR DAY Edward is going down the stairs followed by a young blonde man, wearing a very elegant suit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Phil suggested that maybe I should take a lawy...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Phil is just my lawyer, okay ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How did the Morse stock open at the Nikkei ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DOWNSTAIRS HALL - INTERIOR DAY They have reached the downstairs hall. Edward looks at his watch and then turns toward the young man. He is looking slightly angry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't know ? Tokyo opened maybe ninety minutes ago. You have to keep on top of these things, all right ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Done. Two charming women walks near the two men. One of the woman turns toward Edward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello, Mr. Lewis.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi. How're you doing ? Edward shakes the woman's hand, who walks away, and turns back to the young blonde man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want this whole thing... wrapped up as soon as possible. I gotta get to New York by Sunday. I got tickets to the Met.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, sir. He moves across the crowd of guests, and reaches a servant, who gives him his coat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your coat, Mr. Lewis.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you. He starts walking away with his coat in his hands, when he turns around to the sound of a feminine voice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Edward !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Susan ! Susan is a beautiful woman, in her late thirties, wearing an elegant yellow silk blouse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi. They kiss on both cheeks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was sorry to hear about Carter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, yeah. Thanks. Heard you got married. They start walking slowly toward the exit of the house, Edward's arm around Susan's waist.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well... yeah. I couldn't wait for you ! She laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mmm... Mmm... Susan, tell me something.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes ? They stop walking, and Edward faces Susan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When you and I were dating, did you speak to my secretary more than you spoke to me ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She was one of my bridesmaids.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hmm. Your husband's a very lucky guy. They kiss again on the cheeks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bye.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks, bye.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY Medium shot of Philip seated in an armchair, talking to a beautiful red-hair woman, seated in another armchair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Absolutely.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wonderful. Elizabeth, Philip's wife, walks rapidly toward Philip's armchair and taps him on the shoulder. Elizabeth is a red-hair woman in her forties. She is still nice-looking, and very elegantly dressed, but she doesn't have anymore the attraction that a younger woman can have on Philip.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's leaving. Edward's leaving. Philip looks toward the entrance of the house, and stands up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure. Philip walks rapidly away while Elizabeth looks at him with both hand on her hips.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - PARKING - EXTERIOR DAY Close shot on a beautiful car : a grey Lotus Esprit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Is this Mr. Stuckey's car ? Medium shot of two Japanese parking valets, wearing white shirts, black bow-ties and black vests, looking at him. One of them answers him in Japanese. We don't understand what he says, but we understand the word Stuckey in his sentence. Medium shot on Edward standing near Philip's Lotus. Edward turns around just as Philip is rushing toward him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Edward, where you going ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You got the keys to your car ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why, what's wrong with the limo ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, the limo is buried back there. Darryl can't get it out. Darryl, Edward's chauffeur, is reading a newspaper, next to another chauffeur. Darryl is a very tall and very strong-looking Afro-American man. He raises his hand to show his helplessness about the situation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mmm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please give me the keys. Philip gives his car keys to Edward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right, look. I don't think you should drive. You're a little excited. Don't drive my car. Let me work something out here. Philip runs toward the Japanese valets.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fellas, what kind of a system is this ? Can you move these cars out of here ? Meanwhile, Edward has seated himself in the driver seat of the Lotus Esprit. Philip comes back to him as Edward closes the door of the car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, Edward. Edward... Uh, are you familiar with a stick shift ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Have you driven a shift ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. Yeah. Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Listen, all right. Just be ginger with it. Don't... We hear the gears of the manual box clashing under Edward's unexperienced hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a new car. Don't, uh... Just don't...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. I can do it. Tires squeal as the car rushes forward. The Japanese valets look up at the noise. Edward has stopped after a couple of feet, and Philip runs to the driver's door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Edward ! Give me a break, please !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I love this car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I love it too. Look, you don't even know where you're going. You're gonna get lost in the dark ! The car rushes forward. Tires squeal as Edward accelerate down the hill road. The sky is slightly darker. Night is falling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Beverly Hills is down the hill !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Full shot of the Lotus Esprit driving along the streets of Hollywood Hills. Edward has switched the lights on. We hear the song King of Wistful thinking, performed by Go West.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't need to fall at your feet. Just 'cause you cut me to the bone. And I won't miss the way that you kiss me. The sky is getting darker, and apparently, Edward doesn't know his way very well around Hollywood Hills. Long shot on the famous HOLLYWOOD sign up on Hollywood Hills Back to the car driving on the roads of Hollywood Hills. Aerial shot of the car coming to a dead end in a parking lot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Oh, shit. The car backs up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aerial overview of Hollywood. The last set of credits starts in white capital letters on this overview. The music keeps on playing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We were never carved in stone. If I don't listen to the talk of the town. Then maybe I can fool myself. I'll get over you I know I will. I'll pretend my ship's not sinking. And I'll tell myself I'm over you. The overview now shows Hollywood Boulevard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 'Cause I'm the king of wishful thinking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Full shot on street level on Hollywood Boulevard. The credits are still appearing and disappearing on the screen. A man is selling maps, advertised by a huge board he is carrying, and on which is written in red letters : Maps of the Stars Homes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maps here. Maps. Close Up on two hands exchanging money and drug. Then Close Up on the faces of the two men.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Have a good one. Medium shot of two prostitutes cruising on the sidewalk. A car drives along the sidewalk, but doesn't stop.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) What do you say, blondie ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi, honey, want some fun ? Close Up on the Carole Lombard Star on the Hollywood Boulevard sidewalk. Medium shot on two other prostitutes cruising on the sidewalk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, baby, you looking for a date ? Larger shot on a car stopping near the prostitute
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, honey, we're looking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, here I am.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm Al and this is my friend Joe. Get in the car. Another very short view of Hollywood Boulevard, showing a Close shot on a Chinese Restaurant. An then, a very fast horizontal panning of the camera, which gives us a blurred picture. The panning stops in :
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Medium long shot on a very quiet side street near Hollywood Boulevard. The street seems even much quieter after all the noise and the hustle we've seen on the Boulevard itself. The credits are still appearing and disappearing on the screen. An ambulance is driving very fast along the street, with its siren wailing. On the side of the ambulance is written : Los Angeles Fire Department, and below : Paramedic. The camera lets the ambulance go and moves to show us a shady- looking building with a vertical neon sign saying HOTEL, but only the H and the O are lit, the others letters being out of order. The music fades out. This building actually is partly a regular hotel, and partly a place that rents small apartments on a monthly basis.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR NIGHT We are in the small apartment rented by Vivian Ward and Kit De Luca, two young prostitutes, whom we are going to know better later on. Close Up on a pretty woman buttocks, just covered by a very small black lace panty. An alarm clock is ringing. The woman turns around, and shows us her stomach and her navel, showing from under a pink T-shirt. The camera pans up to the woman's arm and hand stopping the alarm- clock. Close-Up on several familial pictures pinned on the wall. Close-Up on the woman putting on a white sleeveless close-fitting T-shirt over her black lace bra. But we don't see the woman's head. Close-Up on the woman's hand picking up cheap jewels from a table, and putting them on. On the table there is also an empty bottle of a strong alcoholic beverage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Close Up on Edward's face, driving the car. He seems a bit lost.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Medium long shot on the Lotus driving on Hollywood Boulevard. We hear the song Real Wild Child, performed by Christopher Otcasek. Credits keeps on appearing and disappearing on the screen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I'm just goin' to school like I'm real, real cool. Gotta dance like a fool Got the message.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR NIGHT Close-Up on a black stiletto-heel boot. The woman's hand is using a black felt-pen to hide the clear spots on the heel of the boot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And I gotta be a wild one Ooh, yeah. I'm a wild one. Close-Up on the woman's hand pulling the zipper up along the side of the boot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gonna break it loose. Gonna keep on moving wild. Close-Up on the face of the woman, putting mascara on her eyelashes. The woman is named Vivian Ward, and her head is covered by a blonde wig.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gonna keep on swinging, baby I'm a real wild child.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Lotus is driving through a crossroad. The tires screech, and the car swings a little. Apparently, Edward is still having problems with his gear shift. The camera follows the car for a couple of seconds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Close Up on Vivian's legs going down the stairway. Then the camera moves backward and we see her in full. Another woman is going up the stairs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Now, wait a minute. You don't seem to understand me. Vivian stop in mid-stairs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) That's my job. At the end of the month, I collect everybody's rent. Quick shot, through the bannister, of the manager talking to an Afro-American woman. Back to Vivian still standing on the stairs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Now give me the money, or you're outta here. Vivian goes back up the stairs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - BATHROOM - INTERIOR NIGHT Close-Up on the toilet water tank, and Vivian's hands taking the lid off. She then takes a green plastic box out of the water. She opens the box and looks at the money hidden inside the box. There is only one one-dollar bill left.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gonna meet all my friends. Gonna have myself a ball. Gonna tell my friends. Gonna tell them all.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR NIGHT Vivian crosses the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That I'm a wild one. Ooh, yeah I'm a wild one. Vivian opens a window and gets out of the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: High angle shot of Vivian going out of the window and on the emergency exit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gonna break the news. Gonna keep on moving wild. Gonna keep on swinging, baby. I'm a real wild child. Vivian starts going down the emergency stairway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A dark street around Hollywood. The Lotus is driving slowly. The engine is revving, as the car turns around the corner of the street.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Edward looks around him, visibly a bit anxious : he know he is completely lost.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Close Up on Vivian's face seen through the emergency ladder moving down. An old woman is looking at her from across the street. Full shot on the building and Vivian going down the steps of the emergency ladder. Close shot on Vivian reaching ground level and walking away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm a real wild one and I like wild fun. In a world going crazy everything seems hazy. Medium shot. Vivian walks though a gap in the wire fence behind the hotel, and walks away on the street. The camera tilts slightly up and we see a painted inscription on the wall of the hotel that says HOTEL - APTS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm a wild one. Ooh, yeah, I'm a wild one. Gonna break the news Gonna keep on moving wild.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Long shot. The shot is slightly high angled.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gonna keep on swinging, baby I'm a real wild child. End of credits. The camera pans around and comes down to street level. The music fades out. We hear the voice of an Afro-American man yelling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Welcome to Hollywood ! Everybody comes to Hollywood got a dream. What's your dream ? What's your dream ? A young man with a red T-shirt and a white cap crosses the boulevard on a skateboard. He reaches the sidewalk and gets lost in the crowd. We see the Afro-American man. He is wearing a flashy printed shirt. He crosses the boulevard coming toward us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, mister ? Hey, what's your dream ? Medium shot on a group of three young men seated on the sidewalk. One of them is the skateboard man we've just seen crossing the boulevard. The young man stands up. He has apparently given something (drugs ?) to the two other ones.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Have a good one. He jumps on his skateboard and rolls away. He passes Vivian who is walking toward us. With the street lights, we get a better view of Vivian. She is a young woman in her early twenties. She is very tall and slim. She is a beautiful woman, even though her prostitute outfit and heavy make-up makes her a little less beautiful than she actually is. She is wearing a red jacket and a man's very large cap on her blonde wig. Underneath the jacket she is wearing her very short sleeveless white top, which is attached to her also very short blue skirt with a big metal ring. She is carrying a big bag strapped on her shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) What happened ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Some chick. She bought it over there. Medium shot just a little further on the street. A young plain- cloth policeman is showing his badge to an afro-american man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Detective Albertson. What do you know about that girl ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I tell you, man. I don't know who she hang with. Vivian walks behind them. She gives them a quick look, but doesn't stop.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, guy. We just pulled her out of a Dumpster in the back. Who was her pimp ? The camera follows Vivian, but we keep hearing what the two men are saying.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Cocaine her pimp. She a strawberry. She be out on these streets day in, day out, trading her sorry self for some crack. Vivian stops, and looks at something we don't see on the sidewalk. She turns her head away, not feeling well because of what she has just seen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) And what do you do ? Back to the two men.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm cool.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (snickering) Oh, I'll bet. He turns around. Two tourists, a male and a female are taking snapshots of what is down on the pavement, and which we still haven't seen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, hey, hey ! Excuse me ! Excuse me ! What are you, from the press ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, no. We're from Orlando. The policeman looks at his uniformed colleague.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, I don't believe this. Do you... I got tourists photographing the body, Al. The uniformed policeman starts pulling the tourists away. Close-Up shot on a lit sign that says The Blue Banana Club, Full shot from across the street, showing the entrance of the club, with the sign, that we've just seen, above the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) What happened ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Man !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - MAIN ROOM - INTERIOR NIGHT Close up on a woman's hips moving in rhythm with the sound of the music. The camera tilts up and we discover she is painting a fresco on the wall of the club. The fresco represents various hippy-looking characters. The camera pans along the fresco and then moves back into the crowd of the club. People are dancing. We hear the song Show Me Your Soul performed by Red Hot Chili Peppers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In a world that can be so insane. I don't think it's very strange for me to be in love with you. Vivian crosses the dance floor and stops near a staircase leading to the upper floor. She looks around, visibly looking for someone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wanna know more than your brain. Vivian walks to the bar. The bartender is an older man, nicknamed Pops.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, Pops, has Kit been in here ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Upstairs in the poolroom. Vivian goes to the staircase and start walking upstairs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not something that I respected. And now I smile for your affection. We have made a soul connection.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - UPSTAIRS POOLROOM - INTERIOR NIGHT Close shot on Kit De Luca sitting down, and bobbing her head up and down in rhythm with the music. Kit is a girl in her early twenties. She is clearly shorter than Vivian, and has dark hair. She looks a bit Latino. Actually she from Italian origin. She is pretty, but not as beautiful as Vivian, and more vulgar. She is wearing sunglasses and is absently combing the front of her hairline.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just for whom does your bell toll. Don't be cruel. Show me your soul. Kit suddenly realizes that someone is standing near her and looking down at her. She stops combing her hair and looks up. She takes her glasses off and smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yo, Viv ! Vivian doesn't smile back at her, and looks even a bit angry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is it all gone ? Instead of answering her friend's question, she points to the people around her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Carlos, you know my roommate, Vivian. This is Angel. That's the Dude.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know everybody ! Is it all gone, Kit ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Carlos sold me some great shit. We just had this party. I was the hostess.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't believe you bought drugs with our rent. What is going on with you, Kit ? Vivian grabs Kit's arm and makes her stand up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I needed a little pick-me-up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, we need rent money ! Carlos stands up and faces Vivian. He is a young Latino man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yo, calm down, chica. She only owes me 200 more.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Carlos !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Another 200 dollars ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That was from way before.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's right, 200, Vivian. But if you wanna work off her money with me, we can work something out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's a very sweet offer, Carlos, but not now. She grabs Vivian's arm and leads her to the staircase.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, Viv. Come downstairs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Work out... Work out what ? What are we gonna work out ? When they are gone, the girl named Angel looks at Carlos.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You really like her, Carlos ? The music fades out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - MAIN ROOM - INTERIOR NIGHT Vivian and Kit are walking down the staircase.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You took it while I was sleeping ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You were unavailable for consultation. Kit walks to the bar, and makes Vivian follow her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, let's go. Snack ! Snack ! She has reached the bar and starts picking bits of food in plates on the counter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Besides, it's my apartment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, well, I have to live there too, Kit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, you came here. I gave you some money. I gave you a place to stay... Close Up on Kit's hands picking food (olives, onions, cherries...) in the snack plates, and putting them on a paper napkin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...and some valuable vocational advice. He was on my case. I had to give him something. Back to the two girls behind the bar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So don't irritate me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This ain't a buffet, Kit. Kit moves around Vivian, sits on a stool at the bar, and starts eating.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Irritate you ? Irritate you ? I just saw a girl pulled out of a Dumpster. She sits down on another stool.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know. Skinny Marie. But... she was a... a flake. She was a crack head. Dominic was trying to straighten her out for months. We hear people shouting in the background and glass being broken. The two girls turns their heads around for a second and then come back to their conversation at the bar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Leave her alone !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Leave her alone !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Come on, Blake !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't you want to get out of here ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get out of where ? Where the fuck you wanna go ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A very quiet street. Close shot on a tramp looking though some junks left over on the sidewalk, in front of a house.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aah, nothing but garbage. Full shot on the street, seen from the other side of the street. The Lotus Esprit stops at the tramp's level.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Uh, excuse me. The tramp lifts his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Huh ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Can you tell me how to get to Beverly Hills ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're here ! Close Up shot on Edward's face behind the wheel on his car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) That's Sylvester Stallone's house right there. He snickers. Back to the full shot of the street with the Lotus and the tramp behind it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're welcome. The car moves away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Medium full shot on Vivian and Kit standing near a table on which a man is selling some souvenirs. Another prostitute is leaning on a tree. Kit walks toward the prostitute.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, yo, Rachel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. You see the stars on the sidewalk, babe ? She is mentioning the stars of the Walk of Fame, embedded in the sidewalk of the boulevard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, Vivian and me, we work Bob Hope, we work the Ritz Brothers, we work Fred Astaire, we work all the way down to Ella Fitzgerald. This is our turf. We got seniority. You better get off our corner.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forgive me. I was just taking a rest here. Besides, she's new.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. Well, I'm old, so go rest up by Monty Hall or Esther Wilson.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Williams.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Esther Williams ! Where you belong !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Back off, Kit. You know, you're really becoming a grouch. She walks away on the boulevard. Kit turns toward Vivian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Am I really a grouch ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. Sometimes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, just 'cause I'm hungry. I'm gonna go get something to eat. We hear someone whistling, and then :
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Hey, girls. Kit turns toward the boulevard, where the voice is coming from.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, yo, baby ! Medium shot on an open convertible red car driving along the boulevard. In the car, three young men, two in the front, one in the back. The man sitting next to the driver, yells to the girls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How about a freebie ? It's my birthday. The car keeps on moving on the boulevard and out of view. Back on Vivian and Kit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dream on !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's looking really slow tonight. She takes her cap off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, well... maybe we should get a pimp, you know. Carlos really digs you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And then he'll run our lives and take our money. No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're right. We say who, we say when, we say how much.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you think I look like Carol Channing ? Kit puts her hands on Vivian's blonde wig.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No ! I love this look. It's very glamorous. Glamour choice. We hear brakes screeching. Kit turns around toward the noise.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, yo, oh, yo. Catch this ! Full shot on the boulevard. The Lotus is driving along the boulevard. The car bounces a little, while the gears are grinding. Back to the two girls watching the car. Vivian points to it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait a minute. That's a Lotus Esprit. We see the car passing in front of the girls. Apparently, it has stopped a little further on the boulevard, because we hear its brakes screeching. Reverse angle shot showing the two girls with the stopped car behind them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, that's rent. You should go for him. You look hot tonight. Don't take less than a hundred. Call me when you're through. Take care of you. Vivian hugs Kit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take care of you. She takes her jacket off and puts it across her bag. She walks slowly toward the car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Work it. Work it, baby. Work it ! Work it. Own it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Edward is sitting behind the wheel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, you can handle this. Close Up on Edward's hand trying to work the gearshift.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) First is here somewhere. We hear the gears grinding, but the shift doesn't want to move into first gear position. Back to Edward sitting in his car. We see Vivian's back bending to look through the passenger's window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, sugar, you looking for a date ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I wanna find Beverly Hills. Can you give me directions ? Reverse angle shot showing Vivian's face through the window
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure. For five bucks. Reverse angle shot on Vivian's back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ridiculous.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Price just went up to ten.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can't charge me for directions. Reverse angle shot on Vivian's face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can do anything I want to, baby. I ain't lost. Reverse angle shot on Vivian's back. She is standing up. Reverse angle shot showing Vivian's standing body through the window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right, okay ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Full shot. On the other side of the boulevard, a little group of people, including Carlos, is looking at the scene.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is that Vivian ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where ? Medium shot on the Lotus seen from the back. Vivian opens the passenger door and climbs in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) All right. You win, I lose. Got change for a twenty ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vivian grabs the 20 dollars bill, and puts it away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For twenty, I'll show you personal. Even show you where the stars live.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, that's all right. I already been to Stallone's.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: On the other side of the boulevard, the little group is still looking at the scene. They start crossing the boulevard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - INTERIOR NIGHT VIVIAN Right. Uh, down the street.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The little group is still crossing the boulevard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vivian, did you forget ? I told you don't take no dates tonight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Edward tries to start the car, but he just starts the windshield wipers !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Vivian !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's go. Close up on Edward's hand trying to work the gearshift.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Hey, where you going, baby ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Close Up on the Lotus rear license plate : 2QCE465 CARLOS (voice over) Vivian ! Larger shot on the car driving away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Lights ! Lights would be good here. Full shot on Hollywood Boulevard traffic, with the Lotus, seen from the front in the middle of the traffic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) I guess this is not the greatest time to be a hooker, is it ? Closer shot showing the couple seen through the windshield
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, I use condoms always. I get checked out once a month at the free clinic. Not only am I better in the sack than an amateur, I am probably safer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - INTERIOR NIGHT EDWARD I like that. That's very good. Should have that printed on your business card.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you're making fun of me, I don't like it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I'm not making fun of you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The couple seen through the windshield.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I'm not making... I'm not. I wouldn't offend you. I'm sorry. Back on the boulevard. A traffic light going from amber to red. We hear the tires screeching as the car stops.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - INTERIOR NIGHT EDWARD What's your name ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you want it to be ? Edward smiles to her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vivian. My name is Vivian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vivian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The light turned green, and the car starts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) So, what hotel you staying at ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) The, uh, Regent Beverly Wilshire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Down the block, right at the corner. We hear gears grinding.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - A WIDE STREET - EXTERIOR NIGHT We are now off Hollywood Boulevard, in another wide street or boulevard in Hollywood. Full shot on the car moving away from us. Medium shot of the couple through the windshield.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Man, this baby must corner like it's on rails !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I beg your pardon ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, doesn't it blow your mind ? This is only four cylinders.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Close Up on Edward's hand trying to change gears. It doesn't really succeed, and we hear a grinding noise.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - A WIDE STREET - EXTERIOR NIGHT Back on the shot through the windshield.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know about cars. Where did that come from ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Road and Track. The boys back home I grew up with, they were really into American heavy metal : Mustangs, Corvettes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - INTERIOR NIGHT VIVIAN They bought them cheap and fixed them up. I paid attention. So how is it you know so little about cars ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My first car was a limousine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So where is this... He tries to shift gears and gets another grinding noise.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...heavy metal... home ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Milledgeville, Georgia. You know, I think you left your transmission back there. You're not shifting right. This is a standard H.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Standard H. Like I know what that means. She laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Have you ever driven a Lotus ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're gonna start right now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - A WIDE STREET - EXTERIOR NIGHT Back on the shot through the windshield.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're joking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. It's the only way I can get you off my coat. Medium shot on a lingerie shop. We see Vivian's head, and then the camera follows her as she climbs into the driver's seat. Edward closes his door on the passenger's side. Vivian closes her door and puts her seat belt on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fasten your seat belts. I am taking you for the ride of your life. I'm gonna show you what this car can really do. Are you ready ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am ready.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hang on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here we go. She adjusts the back-view mirror. Medium close-up shot of the car seen from the back with the camera set on the road. The car starts very fast, but also very smoothly : it is now driven by very expert hands. Several shots of the car racing along the streets. Shot of the the couple through the windshield.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This has pedals like a race car. They're really close together. So it's probably easier for a woman to drive, because they have little feet. Except me. I wear a size nine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - INTERIOR NIGHT VIVIAN You know your foot's as big as your arm from your elbow to your wrist ? She shows her arm to Edward, who chuckles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you know that ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I didn't know that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a little bit of trivia. Edward looks at her and smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - A WIDE STREET - EXTERIOR NIGHT Shot of the couple seen through the windshield.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell me, what kind of... what kind of money you girls make these days ? Ballpark.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can't take less than a hundred dollars.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A hundred dollars a night ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For an hour.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An hour ? You make a hundred dollars an hour and you got a safety pin holding your boot up ? You gotta be joking.

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Neither do I. Hundred dollars an hour. Pretty stiff. She puts her right hand on Edward's zipper.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, no. But it's got potential. Edward doesn't react, but he looks at her in such a way that she feels she has better take her hand off his zipper.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Several shots of the car driving fast in Beverly Hills.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The tires of the car squeal as it makes a last fast turn to stop in front of the hotel. Full shot. The Regent Beverly Wilshire Hotel is a very luxurious hotel, certainly one of the most expensive hotel of the Los Angeles area. Medium shot on a uniformed attendant, who is standing near the entrance of the hotel, and rushes to Edward's car. Medium full shot on the Lotus parked in front of the hotel. The attendant opens the passenger's door of the car, while Vivian comes out of the car on her own.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good evening, Mr. Lewis. Will you be needing the car anymore tonight ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I... I hope not ! He gets out of the car. The attendant closes the door and then moves away, while Vivian joins Edward on the sidewalk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah. You're here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. He looks at her for a couple of second, before talking again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So you'll be all right ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, I'm gonna grab a cab with my twenty bucks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go back to your office. She laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. My office. Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, thanks for the ride.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: See you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good-bye. Edward starts turning around to go inside the hotel, but doesn't do it, and instead looks back in Vivian's direction. Medium shot on Vivian seated on the backrest of a public bench, with her feet resting on the bench itself. She puts her cap back on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) No taxis ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I like the bus. Edward walks to the bench on which Vivian is sitting. Quick medium shot on the uniformed attendant watching the scene with curiosity from the entrance of the hotel. Back to Vivian and Edward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was thinking... Did you really say a hundred dollars an hour ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah... Well, if you don't have any prior engagements, I'd be very pleased if you would accompany me into the hotel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You got it. She gets off the bench and laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is your name ? They start walking toward the entrance of the hotel
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Edward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Edward. That's my favorite name in the whole world ! He smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No ?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I tell you what, this is fate, Edward. That's what this is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why don't you put this on ? He puts his coat, which he was carrying on his arm, on Vivian's shoulders, and then wraps it around Vivian's body, in order to cover as much as he can of Vivian's very conspicuous outfit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, this hotel is not the kind of establishment that rents rooms by the hour.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LOBBY - INTERIOR NIGHT Medium shot on Edward and Vivian crossing the hotel lobby. While walking, Vivian puts her arms into the sleeves of the coat. Then she raises her eyes to look at the luxury around her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wow !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) It's all right. Medium full shot on the guests seated in comfortable armchairs near the front desk. All these guests are very elegantly dressed, and mostly middle-aged. They all look with curiosity at the strange couple that just walked in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Holy shit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're gonna be fine. Come with me. And stop fidgeting. Another medium shots on seated guests staring at the couple. Edward walks to the reception desk, with Vivian following him. A very neatly dressed female receptionist is behind the counter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good evening, Mr. Lewis.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello. You have messages ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, we have several.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you. While Edward is looking through his messages, Vivian is leaning on the wall near the reception desk and looks around her. She takes her cap off, but one still can see her strange outfit underneath the slightly open coat. She stares at a passing female guest who stares back at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Could you send up some champagne and strawberries, please ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course. She picks up the phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Room service for Mr. Lewis, please. Edward slowly walks away from the desk, taking Vivian along with him. Medium shot on the elevator doors. Edward and Vivian reach the elevator, and Edward presses the call button. A middle-aged couple is already waiting for it. They both look at Vivian. Vivian turns around and notice their disapproving look. She raises her leg and puts the tip of her boot on the high ash-tray set near the door of the elevator, showing her thigh to the couple, and especially to the man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, honey. You know what's happened ? I've got a runner in my pantyhose. She laughs and turns to the middle-aged couple.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not wearing pantyhose. We hear the ding of the elevator bell. Vivian puts her leg down. The elevator door opens on Dennis, the young elevator attendant. Vivian is the first one to walk in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, color me happy ! There's a sofa in here for two. Edward wants to let the middle-aged couple enter the elevator first. The man starts to move, but his wife holds him back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - ELEVATOR - INTERIOR NIGHT Reverse angle shot on Vivian sitting on the sofa at the back of the cabin. She puts one leg on the sofa. Dennis looks at her and smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LOBBY - INTERIOR NIGHT Back on the entrance of the elevator. Edward starts to walk in the cabin. The middle-aged couple remains outside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: First time in an elevator.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah... She turns her head toward her husband.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Close your mouth, dear. The door of the elevator closes.
direction.name: direction

result.ToD: THE FEMALE OF THE MIDDLE-AGED COUPLE
result.heading: THE FEMALE OF THE MIDDLE-AGED COUPLE

direction.raw_text: - ELEVATOR - INTERIOR NIGHT Dennis doesn't look at the couple behind him, but he still has a very broad smile. Vivian stands up from the sofa.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry, I couldn't help it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Try. The elevator moves up. Dennis tries to look casual, but doesn't really succeed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - PENTHOUSE HALLWAY - INTERIOR NIGHT Close shot on the elevator door. It opens.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Penthouse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The penthouse. Mmmm !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. Vivian gets out of the elevator.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To the left.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh. Edward gets out of the elevator. Dennis can't keep his eyes off Vivian, and watches her walking in the hallway. Edward turns around and looks at him a bit severely. Dennis wipes the smile off his face, goes back into the cabin of the elevator and closes the doors. The camera follows Edward walking away to the door of the penthouse, where Vivian is waiting for him. He gets his magnetic card out of his pocket. Close Up on Edward's hands trying to insert the magnetic card into the slot in the lock of the door. He sighs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, I miss keys.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR NIGHT Medium shot on the penthouse living room with the front door in the background. Everything - the rug on the floor, the furniture - is nice and very classy. All the lights are on. The front door opens. Edward walk in first, followed by Vivian. He switches more lights on. Vivian closes the door and starts walking around the huge living room. Edward looks at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Impressed ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You kidding me ? I come here all the time. As a matter of fact, they do rent this room by the hour.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure they do. Edward has been taking a newspaper left by an attendant on a small table near the front door. He crosses the room and and drops the newspaper on the desk. He sits down behind the desk, and starts looking through his mail, while Vivian walks out on the terrace.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over from the terrace) Wow, great view ! I bet you can see all the way to the ocean from out here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll take your word for it, because I don't go out there. Vivian walks in the room through another French window-door on the other side of the desk. She puts her bag on an armchair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why don't you go out there ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm afraid of heights.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are ? Edward nods his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So how come you rented the penthouse ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's the best. I looked all around for penthouses on the first floor, but I can't find one. Vivian takes off Edward's coat and puts in on a sofa.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, now that you have me here, what are you going to do with me ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Want to know something ? I don't have a clue.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I hadn't exactly planned this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, do you plan everything ? She takes her red jacket off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Always.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. Me too. She sits down on an armchair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm actually... No, I'm not a planner. I wouldn't say I was a planner. I would say I was, hum, a kind of fly by the seat of my pants girl. You know, moment to moment. That's me. That's... Yeah. Edward, still seated behind his desk, watches her with a strange look in his eyes. He suddenly realizes that perhaps he hasn't done something very wise in bringing Vivian with him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mm-hmm. You know, you could pay me. That's one way to maybe break the ice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, yeah. I'm sorry. Uh, I assume cash is acceptable. He takes his wallet out of this jacket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cash works for me, yeah. She stands up and walks to the desk. Edward puts the money on the desk. She takes the money and sits on the desk. She puts the money in one of her high boots.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're on my fax.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, that's one I haven't been on before. She doesn't stand up but moves slightly in a very suggestive way. Edward takes his fax, but doesn't seem to react at Vivian's suggestive movements.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cute. Very cute. Thank you. She laughs, and zips one of her boots down. Out of the boot, she takes several condoms wrapped in cellophane paper.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right. Here we go. Pick one. I got red, I got green, I got yellow. I'm out of purple, but I do have one gold circle coin left. The condom of champions. The one and only. Nothing is getting through this sucker. What d'you say ? Hmm ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A buffet of safety.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm a safety girl. Edward stands up from his desk. Immediately Vivian reaches for his zipper.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right, let's get one of these on you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, no. I... He laughs awkwardly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why don't we just talk for a little bit, okay ? He takes his jacket off, and puts it on the back of the desk chair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Talk. Yeah... uh... okay. Edward, are you in town on, uh, business or pleasure ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Business, I think. He walks away from the desk across the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Business, you think. She zips her boot back up, stands up and follows him across the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well... let me guess. Edward, now in his shirtsleeves, but still with his necktie and his vest on, has seated himself in an armchair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That would make you... a lawyer. She sits downs on a low pouf in front of his armchair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A lawyer ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mm-hmm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What makes you think I'm a lawyer ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've got that, um... sharp, useless look about you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I bet you've known a lot of lawyers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've known a lot of everybody. The doorbell chimes. They both stand up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is that ? He turns around and find his face very close to Vivian's face, and seems a little disturbed by it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Champagne.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh ! Well. Might as well make myself useful. Take a load off. The doorbell chimes again. Vivian runs across the room to the front door and opens it. A room service male attendant comes in carrying a loaded tray. Vivian closes the door behind him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good evening.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, where would you like it ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where would we like it ? Edward has seated himself back in the armchair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, over by the bar. The attendant seems a little surprised by Vivian's outfit, but, being a good luxury hotel attendant, he pretends not to notice, and carries the tray onto the bar. After he has put the tray down, he turns around and almost bumps into Vivian, who was standing behind him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me ! She giggles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It'll be on your bill, Mr. Lewis.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you. The attendant doesn't move away and remains close to Vivian, staring at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you looking at ? The attendant clears his throat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is he looking at ? Edward walks toward the attendant, and gives him some tip money.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, yes. Here you go. Thank you very much.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you very much, sir. Have a nice night. The attendant walks out of the room. Edward walks to the bar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A tip. Wow. I missed that one. Oh. (in a much softer voice) Stupid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't worry about it. Edward sets the champagne glasses on the bar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You mind if I take my boots off ? She sits down on the steps that run across the room, separating it in two slightly different levels.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not at all.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, do you have a wife ? Girlfriend ? She zips one of her boots down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have both.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where are they ? Shopping together ? She takes her knee-length sock off. We hear the champagne bottle cork popping off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My ex-wife... is now in Long Island... in my ex-home... with my ex-dog. He brings her a glass of Champagne, which he sets down on the floor besides her. Vivian is taking her other boot off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There you go. He walks back to the bar to take his own glass.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My ex-girlfriend, Jessica, is in New York... moving out of my apartment even as we speak. He looks at her, a bit surprised. Vivian is draining her glass empty. Edward comes near her, with a silver bowl in his hands. In the bowl are some fresh strawberries.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why don't you try a strawberry ? He takes the lid off the bowl and shows it to her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It brings out the flavor in the champagne.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, groovy. She takes a strawberry and eats it. Edward closes the bowl and brings it back on the bar. He sits down on a stool.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pretty good. Don't you drink ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Listen, I... I appreciate this whole seduction scene you've got going, but let me give you a tip : I'm a sure thing, okay ? So, I'm on an hourly rate. Could we just move it along ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Somehow I'm sensing that this time problem is a major issue with you. He stands up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why don't we just get through that right now ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Great, let's get started.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How much for the entire night ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stay here ? (SHE SNICKERS) You couldn't afford it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Try me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Three hundred dollars.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Done. Thank you. Now we can relax. He takes the glass off her hand. She stands up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you sure you want me to stay for the entire night ? I mean, I could just pop you good and be on my way. She walks to the bar, where Edward is filling the glass with Champagne.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To tell you the truth, I don't feel like being alone tonight. He gives her the glass, and she immediately drinks it. He sits down on the stool.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why ? Is it your birthday or something ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I mean, I have been the party at a couple of birthdays.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I bet you have.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So what do you want me to do ? He doesn't answer immediately, remains pensive for a couple of seconds, and then looks at her. He laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know. I really don't know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - BATHROOM - INTERIOR NIGHT Close Up on the sink, and Vivian's hands been washed. She turns the faucet off and takes an white towel to dry her hands. The camera tilts up to Vivian's face, who walks to the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll be out in just a minute. That champagne kind of got to me. She closes the door, and goes back to the sink. Edward re-opens the door and enters the bathroom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't hear you. What did you say ? Vivian hides something behind her back, but her hand in her back can be seen in one of the bathroom mirror.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh... I said I'd be out in just a minute. Edward looks worried. He points to her
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is... What do you have in, uh, your hand there ? What are you hiding ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing. He walks toward her and sighs. He grabs her by the arm and moves her toward the door. He takes her hand bag
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right, look. I do not want any drugs here. I don't want any of this. Get your things and your money and please leave. She gets rid of his hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't do drugs, all right ? I... I stopped doing drugs when I was fourteen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is this ? What is this ? Close Up on Vivian's hand, which Edward is opening by force. She was hiding a little box of dental floss. Edward has put Vivian's bag under his arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is dental floss. She takes her dental floss back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah ? So ? I had all those strawberry seeds. And you shouldn't neglect your gums.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry. Please continue.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you. She walks to the sink. He start walking across the room, but stops in his tracks, and looks at her. She turns around from the sink and looks at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you gonna watch ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I'm going. He gives the handbag back to her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's just that, uh, very few people surprise me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, well, you're lucky. Most of them shock the hell out of me. He nods his head. She goes back to the sink and brings a piece of dental floss to her mouth, stops, and brings it down. She turns around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're watching.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm going. He closes the door. Vivian starts cleaning her teeth with dental floss.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR NIGHT Close Up shot on the TV screen, where an old black and white episode of I love Lucy is being played. It is episode 23 from Season 5, called Lucy's Italian Movie. Lucy is standing close to a huge bucket full of grapes, and seems a bit reluctant to climb into it. Behind her, a fat Italian lady is speaking Italian to her. We hear recorded laughs coming from the TV set. The camera moves away from the TV set. We hear Edward's voice speaking on the telephone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Yes, that may be true, Vance. We hear Vivian laughing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Yes, I know, but I still need the numbers on Morse Industries. On the TV screen, the Italian fat lady is climbing into the bucket full of grapes. The camera keeps on moving away from the TV set, and we discover Vivian sitting on the floor and drinking Champagne. And, behind her, we see Edward sitting on an armchair near a small table on which the telephone set is resting. Edward is writing on a document resting on his laps.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh-huh. I've got them from London. I need them now from Tokyo. I'll call down and get them when I want them. Thank you very much. He puts the phone down back on its hook. Medium high angle shot on Vivian sitting on the floor, with all kinds of goodies around her, including the Champagne bottle in its bucket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have a little carpet picnic here. Are you sure you don't want a drink ? Back on Edward, still writing on the document on his laps. He snorts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm high on life. Can't you tell ? Quick shot on Vivian laughing. Medium shot on the TV screen, where Lucy is putting a reluctant foot in the bucket. Close Up on her foot reaching into the grapes. She screams with a wide open mouth. Back on Vivian changing position and lying on her stomach to be more comfortable to watch TV. She laughs. Edward watches her without moving from his armchair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) You know, I never saw this episode. Edward chuckles. And then he stands up. Vivian is still lying on the floor, laughing. Edward sits down on the sofa next to her. Shot on the TV screen, where Lucy is stomping the grapes, with a disgusted face. We hear Vivian laughing very loudly. Close Up on Vivian's face laughing and holding the glass of Champagne. She looks up at Edward, still seated on the sofa. Close shot on Edward looking at Vivian Close Up shot on Vivian's face. She has a strange smile on her face. Close Up shot on Edward's face looking at Vivian. Back to Vivian. We hear the recorded laughs coming from the TV set. Vivian stands up on her arms and knees and walks on all four toward the sofa. Quick shot on the TV screen, where Lucy and the other woman are stomping the grapes. High angle shot on Vivian on her knees near the sofa. She puts a hand up inside Edward's pants leg. Edward snorts. On the TV screen, Lucy now seems to be enjoying her grapes stomping. Still resting on her knees, Vivian is taking her white top off her shoulders. She slips it down, and because the top is attached to the skirt, the skirt comes down with it. Vivian is now wearing only her black lace underwear and bra. Vivian puts the top and the skirt away from her on the floor, and bends down on the seated Edward. Suddenly, she stands up and walks away. Edward seems surprised. But she comes back with a cushion that she drops on the floor, and then kneels on it. She takes the TV remote control from the table by the sofa, and presses a button on it. On the TV screen, Lucy and the Italian lady are still stomping the grapes, but the sound shuts off. Back to the sofa. Closer shot. Vivian puts the remote control back on the table. Then she leans on Edward, and starts taking his necktie off. Edward puts his hand on her hair, and seems surprised : he hadn't realized it was a wig. Quick shot on the TV screen, where Lucy and her Italian friend are now dancing on the grapes. Back to the sofa, where Vivian is taking Edward's pants off. She opens his shirt on his chest, and bends on it. Close Up on their two faces, very close to each other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you want ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you do ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Everything. But I don't kiss on the mouth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Neither do I. She bends on his chest and starts kissing him on the chest, going down. She stops to look at the TV. On the TV screen, the Italian lady is throwing grapes in Lucy's face. Back to Vivian, who smiles and resumes her kissing job on Edward's chest. Close Up shot on Edward's face : he is inhaling very strongly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - BATHROOM - INTERIOR NIGHT Edward is in the shower, hot water pouring on his head. He opens his eyes and seems to think about what just happened. He turns around to turn the water off. Close Up shot on the shower head. The water stops pouring from the head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - BEDROOM - INTERIOR NIGHT Edward is just out of the bathroom, wearing a white bathrobe. He puts his towel around his neck. He bends on the armchair, and picks up one of Vivian's bracelet. The camera pans away from the armchair, showing Vivian's clothes and stuff scattered around, including her blonde wig. Edward looks at Vivian's things, then turns his head around toward the bed. He looks at the bed for a couple of seconds without moving, then starts walking toward the bed. Reverse angle shot, showing Vivian asleep on her stomach in the bed, her long red hair scattered around her head. Edward walks away from the bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR NIGHT Medium full shot in the dark room. Edward is sitting behind the desk, working, the only light in the room being the lamp on the desk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Early morning. Full shot on the facade of the hotel. Two men are cleaning the sidewalk in front of the hotel, one with a water hose, the other one with a big broom. A uniformed attendant is watching them, standing near the main door of the hotel. The man holding the broom walks toward the attendant.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, how you doing there ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LOBBY - INTERIOR DAY Medium full shot of the lobby. At his early hour, there are not many guests in the lobby of the hotel, only a chambermaid dusting a table, and three uniformed attendants talking together. Barnard Thompson, the manager of the hotel, crosses the lobby, wearing a very elegant dark suit, and carrying a black briefcase. Barnard Thompson will be later in the film nicknames Barney by Vivian. It is this nickname that we shall use to refer to him in the dialogues.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good morning, gentlemen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good morning, Mr. Thompson.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good morning, good morning. He keeps on walking toward the reception desk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good morning, sir. Behind the desk, three clerks, two females and one male
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good morning.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good morning, Mr. Thompson. A chambermaid is cleaning some leather armchairs around a low table in front of the desk. Without interrupting his walk, Barney turns his head toward her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good morning, Marjorie. She waves her hand to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY A uniformed waiter, with white glove, is setting the breakfast table. Edward enters the room, wearing a dark-colored night-robe, and with a wireless telephone receiver stuck between his head and his shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course Morse is going to fight. It's to be expected. He's run his company for a very long time now. I don't think he's ready to have his name taken off the stationery. Edward signs the bill the waiter has shown to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DINING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY Medium shot of Philip sitting behind the breakfast table. He is talking to Edward on the telephone. On the table in front of him, a cup, white china pots and a glass of orange juice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He wants to meet you face to face, hmm...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY EDWARD (whispering to the waiter) Okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over from the telephone) I wouldn't do it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure, you wouldn't. But do it anyhow. Tonight. Dinner. Set it up. Edward sits on a chair at the breakfast table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DINING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY PHILIP Oh, Edward, Edward. I... Look, it's really not a good idea that you see him. A middle-aged maid walks behind him with a glass jar of coffee, fresh from the percolator. She wants to pour some coffee in Philip's cup, but, with his free hand, he moves her away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Definitely not alone. (HE CHUCKLES) You know ? He's a feisty old guy. You know, we say the wrong thing... (He snaps his fingers) ...we could wind up in court. The maid walks out of the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY EDWARD Well, you know, there's always a possibility things are gonna go wrong. The waiter leaves the room, and Vivian walks in from the bedroom, wearing a white bathrobe.
direction.name: direction
