direction.raw_text: That's why I enjoy this so much. Oh, by the way, Phil, about your car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DINING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY Suddenly, Philip has a worried look on his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, God. What ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY Vivian stops in the middle of the room, behind Edward's back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It corners like it's on rails.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DINING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY PHILIP What ? What does that mean ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY PHILIP (voice over on the telephone) Edward ? Edward ! He presses the off button on the telephone and puts it on the table. He picks up his newspaper. Vivian has not moved from the spot where she had stopped in the middle of the living room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi. Edward turns around and smiles to Vivian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, good morning. She slightly touches her hair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Red.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Better.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...You didn't wake me. I can see you're really busy. I'm gonna be out of here in just a minute.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, there's no hurry. Are you hungry ? You must be. He stands up from the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why don't you sit and have something to eat ? She walks slowly to the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: uh, took the liberty of ordering everything on the menu. Close Up shot on the table. Edward takes off the metal lids that were covering two plates. One has scrambled eggs and bacon, the other one has pancakes and strawberries.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't know what you'd like.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right ? Good. Edward puts the lids on the table. Vivian takes a pancake and walks slowly to the terrace. She seems embarrassed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you sleep well ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, too good. Vivian enters the terrace.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over from the terrace) I forgot where I was. Edward has seated himself at the breakfast table and is working on some documents.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Occupational hazard ? She comes back into the room and chuckles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. Did you sleep ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, yes, a little, on the couch. She sits down on the table near Edward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was, uh, working last night.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't sleep, you don't do drugs, you don't drink, you hardly eat. What do you do, Edward ? Because I know you're not a lawyer. He laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's right. He looks at her sitting on the table, and points to the chairs around the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There are four other chairs here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh. She stands up and walks to an empty chair. She sits on it with one foot on the chair and her knee up above table level. She goes on eating breakfast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So what do you do ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I buy companies.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What kind of companies ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, I buy companies that are in financial difficulty.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If they have problems, you must get them for a bargain, huh ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, the company I'm buying this week, I'm getting for the bargain price of about one billion. She almost chokes on her pancake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A billion dollars ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wow. You must be really smart, huh ? He chuckles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I only got through the eleventh grade. How far did you go in school ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I went all the way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your folks must be really proud, huh ? He doesn't answer and just smiles. She keeps on eating and tries to peak at the documents in front of him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - BATHROOM - INTERIOR DAY Edward is in shirtsleeves and vest, in front of the mirror, knotting his tie. Vivian walks in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So you don't actually have a billion dollars, huh ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I get some of it from banks, investors. It's not an easy thing to do. She sits down on the table in front of him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And you don't make anything.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And you don't build anything.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So what do you do with the companies once you buy them ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I sell them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here, let me do that. She grabs his necktie and starts knotting it properly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You sell them ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I... don't sell the whole company. I break it up into pieces... and then I sell that off. It's worth more than the whole. Close Up shot on Edward's necktie, and Vivian's hands knotting it. Back on a medium shot of Vivian working on Edward's tie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So it's sort of like, um, stealing cars and selling them for the parts, right ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, sort of. But legal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mm-hmm. Close Up on Edward's tie, which is now very well knotted.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) There. See, now it's perfect. Edward puts a final hand on his tie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not bad. Not bad at all. Where'd you learn to do that ? She stands up and goes out of the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I screwed the debate team in high school. She comes back with his jacket, and helps him put in on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I had a grandpa ! He was nice to me. He liked ties on Sundays. Mind if I, um, take a swim in your tub before I go ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not at all. Just stay in the shallow end. He goes out of the bathroom, followed, a couple of seconds later, by Vivian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DINING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY The breakfast has been cleared away. Philip's expensive leather attache-case is lying on the table, supporting a big agenda. Philip is on the phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over on the phone) Hello ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Edward, it's Phil. Listen, I'm running out the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - BEDROOM - INTERIOR DAY Medium shot. Edward is speaking on a regular cord phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over on the phone) I just wanted to let you know, Morse is all set for tonight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, that's good.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over on the phone) He's bringing his grandson.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DINING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY PHILIP He's grooming him to take over. I don't know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - BEDROOM - INTERIOR DAY EDWARD Ah, yes. Very intense young man named David. He plays polo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DINING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY PHILIP Look, I gotta say this again. I don't like you going alone, you know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - BEDROOM - INTERIOR DAY In the background, we hear Vivian singing Kiss by Prince... not very well !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (singing in voice over) I just want your extra time and your... The rest of the song is covered by what Philip is saying to Edward over the phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over on the phone) Look... Well, I just think it'd be better if you... if you went with a date.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (singing in voice over) Uh-oh ! Edward walks out of the bedroom, carrying the telephone set.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over on the phone) You know ? Keep it social. He chuckles in the phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (singing in voice over) Uh - uh - uh !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - BATHROOM - INTERIOR DAY Still carrying the phone set and with the phone receiver on his ear, Edward enters the bathroom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (singing in voice over) Got to know talk, baby, baby !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over on the phone) Edward ? Did you hear me ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, yes. Yeah, I'm here. He walks to the bathtub, where Vivian is immersed in a foam-bath. She has earphones on her ears, and she is singing with her eyes closed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you want to impress me...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over on the phone) What is that ? Edward is standing near the bathtub, but Vivian, because of the loud music in her earphones and her closed eyes, doesn't seem to notice him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh-oh-oh...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Housekeeping is singing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Got to be too flirty, Mama...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DINING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY Philip seems a bit surprised by what he hears over the telephone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (singing in voice over in the phone) I know how to undress me... Philip tries to concentrate on what he is saying to Edward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah... listen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - BATHROOM - INTERIOR DAY Edward is still standing near the bathtub with the telephone to his ear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over on the phone) Edward, I know a lot of nice girls. Edward snorts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, you don't. Medium shot on the bathtub, where Vivian is still singing with her eyes closed. We see the yellow walkman lying on the bathtub edge near her head. She is holding the water faucet with one hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I just want your extra time and your... She makes loud kisses with her mouth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kiss... Back to Edward standing near the bathtub.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Besides, I already have one.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (singing in voice over) If you want to impress me... Edward starts walking around the bathtub to get closer to Vivian's head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You just concentrate on finding out what Morse is up to.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh-uh, you can't be too flirty, mama.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm on my way. High angle close-up shot on Vivian's head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know how to undress me Mm-hmm... Slight low angle shot of Edward. He has put the telephone set down somewhere, and he is looking at Vivian, smiling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (singing in voice over) Yeah, baby... He sits down on the bathtub edge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (singing in voice over) I want to be your fantasy. Well, maybe you could be mine. Back to Vivian singing in the bathtub.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mm-hmm You just leave it. All up to me. She opens her eyes and notices Edward sitting on the edge of the bathtub close to her. She laughs. Edward also laughs looking at her. Vivian takes off her earphones, and puts them on the edge with the Walkman.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't you just love Prince ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: More than life itself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't you knock ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vivian, I have a business proposition for you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you want ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm gonna be in town until Sunday. I'd like you to spend the week with me. Vivian smiles, not believing what she just heard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. Yes, I'd like to hire you as an employee. Would you consider spending the week with me ? She laughs awkwardly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I will pay you to be at my beck and call.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, I'd love to be your beck and call girl, but, uh, you're a rich, good-looking guy. You could get a million girls free.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want a professional. I don't need any romantic hassles this week.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you're talking twenty-four hours a day, it's gonna cost you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, yes, of course ! He stands up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right, here we go. Give me a ballpark figure. How much ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Six full nights, days too. Four thousand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Six nights at three hundred is eighteen hundred.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You want days too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Two thousand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Three thousand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Done.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Holy shit ! She laughs, and dives her head underwater. Medium full shot of Edward bending over the bathtub.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vivian ? He talks louder for her to be able to hear him underwater.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vivian, is that a yes ? She taps her feet on the bottom of the bathtub. Closer shot of Vivian coming out of the water, her face all covered with foam.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. She brushes the foam off her face. Edward dries her face with a white towel. She spits water and laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY Edward is coming out of the bedroom, followed by Vivian. Vivian is wearing a white bathrobe, and her head is wrapped in a white towel. Edward has taken his wallet out of his pocket and he is giving several banknotes to Vivian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll be gone most of the day. I want you to buy some clothes. Vivian looks at the thick wad of banknotes he just gave her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You really should think about traveler's checks. Edward keeps on walking across the room, with Vivian following him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We may be going out evenings. You'll need something to wear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Like what ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, nothing too flashy. Not too sexy. He stops at the breakfast table, put some documents back in his brief-case and closes it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Conservative. You understand ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Boring.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Elegant. Any questions ? He picks up his brief-case and walks to the front door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can I call you Eddie ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not if you expect me to answer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I would've stayed for two thousands. He had almost reached the door, but he comes back to face her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I would've paid four. I'll see you tonight. He walks to the front door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Baby, I'm gonna treat you so nice, you're never gonna wanna let me go. He has opened the door but he turns around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Three thousand for six days. And, Vivian, I will let you go. He goes out and closes the door. Vivian smiles and speaks very quietly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But I'm here now. She laughs and runs toward the bedroom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - BEDROOM - INTERIOR DAY She laughs and screams, and jumps on the bed. Still laughing wildly, she rolls on the bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Three thousand dollars ! She kicks the bed with her foot. Then she remains quiet for a couple of seconds, gets rid of the towel on her head, and sits up on the bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oof ! She picks up the telephone set on the night table and puts it on the bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - KIT'S BEDROOM - INTERIOR DAY Kit is asleep with a scarf spread on her head. She is wearing a blue T-shirt. On the night table, various fast food items. The phone rings. Kit starts up, and gets rid of the scarf. She pushes the covers away, and, in the bed with her, we discover a Teddy Bear with a red sweater. She picks up the phone from the floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - BEDROOM - INTERIOR DAY Vivian is still seated on the bed, with the phone receiver on her ear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I called and called. Where were you last night ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - KIT'S BEDROOM - INTERIOR DAY Kit sits up on her bed, suddenly worried.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ma ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over on the phone) It's Viv. Kit relaxes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh. Hi. I had to party. Where are you ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - BEDROOM - INTERIOR DAY VIVIAN Oh, man. Are you ready for this ? The guy ? The Lotus ? I am in his hotel room in Beverly Hills. The penthouse. His bathroom is bigger than the Blue Banana !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - KIT'S BEDROOM - INTERIOR DAY Kit has taken a big paper cup, with a straw stuck in it, from the night-table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do I have to hear this ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - BEDROOM - INTERIOR DAY Vivian is getting very serious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kit, he wants me to stay the whole week. And you know what he's gonna give me ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - KIT'S BEDROOM - INTERIOR DAY VIVIAN (voice over on the phone) Guess. You'll never guess. Kit drinks some soda from her cup.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over on the phone) Three thousand dollars.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bullshit !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - BEDROOM - INTERIOR DAY VIVIAN I swear to God. And extra money to buy clothes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - KIT'S BEDROOM - INTERIOR DAY Kit is walking around the room with the telephone receiver stuck between her head and her shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, man ! I am bummed. I gave that guy to you !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - KITCHEN - INTERIOR DAY Kit enters the kitchen and puts her soda cup on the table. The room is a mess. Dirty dishes in the sink. Table covered with food and junk. Clothes hanging to dry in the shower cubicle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Three thousand. Really ? Is he twisted ? Kit looks for something in the mess in the sink.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - BEDROOM - INTERIOR DAY Vivian is now lying on her back with her legs on the pillow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over on the phone) Ugly ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's good-looking !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over on the phone) Well, what's wrong with him ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - KITCHEN - INTERIOR DAY Kit comes out of the shower cubicle with a toothbrush in her hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did he give you the money yet ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over on the phone) At the end of the week.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's what's wrong with him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - BEDROOM - INTERIOR DAY Vivian turns around on the bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, he gave me three hundred for last night. And, Kit ? She sits on the bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm gonna leave some at the front desk for you. I want you to pick it up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY Kit is brushing her teeth while speaking on the phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over on the phone) I'm at the Regent Beverly Wilshire. Write it down. Are you writing it down ? You'll forget it. Write it down. Kit sits down, picks up a felt pen and write on the plastic stool she is sitting on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Reg... Bev... Wil.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - BEDROOM - INTERIOR DAY VIVIAN Now, one more thing. Where do I go for the clothes ? Good stuff, on him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY She is still seated on the stool.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In Beverly Hills ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over on the phone) Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rodeo Drive, baby.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LOBBY - INTERIOR DAY Medium shot. Near the reception desk, the hotel manager, Barnard Barney Thompson is talking with an Italian male guest and an older lady seated in a wheelchair. The Italian guest is showing a business card to Barney and talking in Italian. Vivian crosses the lobby, dressed in the same prostitute outfit as the day before, but without her wig. She has her large handbag across her shoulder and her red jacket is tied around her waist. Barney gives her a quick look, but goes back to his conversation with the Italian guest. He takes the card the Italian is holding.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah ! Medium shot on the reception desk. Miss Wilson, a blonde bespectacled receptionist girl is behind the desk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, ma'am. May I help you ? Vivian puts an envelope on the desk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, I'm leaving this here for Kit De Luca. She's gonna pick it up. The receptionist takes the envelope and looks at it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't open that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, ma'am. Back on Barney and the Italian guests. [ SPEAKING ITALIAN ]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Multo Grazie. Arrivederci.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Arrivederci. Vivian walks near them, with the high heels of her boots clicking on the floor. The Italian starts pushing the wheelchair. Barney looks at Vivian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Andiamo. Reverse angle shot on the lobby. Vivian keeps on walking quite fast, and barely avoids bumping into an uniformed hotel attendant loaded with luggage. Reverse angle shot on Barney still standing at the same place. He turns his head toward the desk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Miss Wilson, do you know that lady ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, sir. Barney turns back toward the departing Vivian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Full shot of the building of the hotel. We hear the song Wild Women Do, performed by Natalie Cole.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wild women do. And they don't regret it. The camera pans down to street level and away from the hotel into Rodeo Drive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The camera pans along the expensive shop along Rodeo Drive. Many well-dressed people are walking on the sidewalk. Several are carrying bags from the shops.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wild women show what they're going through. The camera crosses the street on a crosswalk. Vivian is walking on this crosswalk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ooh ! Wild women do what you think you'll never. Vivian looks at the pedestrians, so different from the ones she is used to see on Hollywood Boulevard. Several quick Close Up shots on various emblems above the shops : Louis Vuitton, Chanel, Diamonds on Rodeo Gucci
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What you only dream about wild women do. Mediums shot. Vivian stops near a jewel shops and looks in the window at the expensive jewels. She then moves away, looking around and smiling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, yes, they do. Vivian keeps on walking looking up at the emblems. She apparently doesn't notice that several pedestrians are looking at her, surprised by her costume.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You tell me you want a woman who is simple as a flower. Close shots on the beautiful clothes in the windows and then at Vivian smiling and looking at the clothes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, if you want me to act like that, you've got to pay me by the hour. A convertible BMV drives on the street. Both the male driver and the female passenger are talking on their cell phones.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A very expensive boutique. A saleswoman and an old lady are seated on a sofa. The saleswoman is showing some items of clothing to the old lady. Through the window, we see Vivian walking toward the entrance of the shop.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wild women do and they don't regret it. Close shot on another saleswoman, who is arranging some flowers in a big vase. She is very neatly dressed and looks a bit snobbish. Vivian enters the shop. The saleswoman seated on the sofa looks up at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, wild women show what they're going through. A third saleswoman, wearing a black jacket and standing behind a counter, looks up at Vivian. The saleswoman, who is arranging the flowers, also looks at Vivian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oooh-whoo ! Ooh, yeah. Vivian stops to look around and then walks to dresses hanging on a rail, and starts looking at them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wild women do what you think you'll never. The music fades out. High angle shot on the whole shop. The saleswoman (Saleswoman #
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ), who was arranging the flower, is now standing behind Vivian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: May I help you ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I'm just checking things out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you looking for something in particular ? Medium shot on Vivian and the saleswoman. Vivian has moved away from the hanging rail.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Well, yeah. Uh... something... conservative. She looks at a dummy wearing a very elegant suit. The saleswoman looks up and down at Vivian's costume, and answers with a forced smile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. Vivian walks away to watch other items in the shop.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You got nice stuff.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How much is this ? Vivian looks at another dummy wearing a very elegant light-colored dress. The saleswoman (Saleswoman # 2) with the black jacket has joined them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't think this would fit you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I didn't ask if it would fit. I asked how much it was. The saleswoman # 1 turns toward her colleague.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How much is this, Marie ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's very expensive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's very expensive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, I got money to spend in here. She starts walking nervously around the shop.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't think we have anything for you. You're obviously in the wrong place. Please leave. The two saleswoman are staring at Vivian, who seems thunderstruck by this unexpected blow. She walks to the door, and leaves the shop.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vivian is walking on the sidewalk of Rodeo Drive, among the very elegantly dressed pedestrians. She has put her red jacket back on and is keeping it close to her waist with one hand. She walks very nervously, and her high heels don't help her to walk in a very elegant way. We catch snatches of the conversations taking place around Vivian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Doctor's office ? Two blocks down and to your left.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you. Vivian seems almost annoyed by those uninteresting bits of conversation. She keeps on walking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Full shot in front of the hotel. Vivian is crossing the street. Two businessmen in grey suits are talking just near the entrance of the hotel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tiffany is taking the corner space. They like the project. We're very excited about the whole thing. Did you realize that Via Rodeo is the first new street... in Beverly Hills in seventy-five years ? Closer shot of Vivian entering the hotel under the surprised stare of the uniformed attendant at the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LOBBY - INTERIOR DAY Vivian crosses the lobby. Barney, the manager, who was standing near the open door of an office, walks toward her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me, miss, may I help you ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm going to my room. She keeps on walking and Barney follows her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, do you have a key ? She stops walking and turns around to face Barney.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh. I forgot that cardboard thing. I'm on the top floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're a guest here ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm with a friend.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And who would that be ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Edward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Edward ? The elevator bell dings and the elevator door opens.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Edward... Edward, uh... Barney nods his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mm-hmmm. Dennis comes out of the elevator. Vivian points at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He knows me. Barney turns toward Dennis.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dennis. Dennis walks toward his boss.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dennis, did you just come off the night shift ? Hmm ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, sir. Barney buttons the collar of Dennis' uniform.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you know this young lady ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's with Mr. Lewis. Dennis speaks with a croaky voice, because Barney is slightly strangling him while buttoning his uniform.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. Lewis ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's it. Edward Lewis ! Thanks, Dennis. She slaps Dennis' shoulder, and moves into the elevator.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Evidently she joined him last night.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you. Barney moves away from Dennis and joins Vivian into the elevator. Dennis puts his hands on his collar to open it and be able to breathe properly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over from the elevator) Oh, God ! What now ? What ? What ? She comes out of the elevator, with Barney holding her elbow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is with everybody today ? They walk along the lobby, away from the elevator. Dennis looks at them and smiles. Two business men, going into the elevator, also look at them, surprised.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, no. It's all right. Just come with me. We'll have a little chat. Thank you. Dennis, thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm coming. I'm coming.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - MANAGER'S OFFICE - INTERIOR DAY Close Up shot on a green plant, with, next to the plant, a metal pot that looks a bit like a coffee pot. Barney's hand takes the pot and starts watering the plant.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Uh, what is your name, miss ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) What do you want it to be ? Full shot of the office. Vivian is seated on a leather armchair in front of an expensive-looking wooden desk, on which several documents are scattered. On the left-hand side of the desk, the total upper half of the wall is a large bay window protected from the outside by vertical Venetian blinds. Under the bay window, a small table on which is the plant Barney is watering.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't play with me, young lady.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vivian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you. Vivian. Barney puts the pot down on the table and sits down on the desk itself just in front of Vivian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, Miss Vivian. Things that go on in other hotels don't happen at the Regent Beverly Wilshire. Now, Mr. Lewis, however, is a very special customer, and we like to think of our special customers as friends. Now, as a customer, we would expect Mr. Lewis to sign in any additional guests, but as a friend, we're willing to overlook it. Now, I'm assuming that you're a... Barney bends his head down, and Vivian also bends her head down before answering.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Relative ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mm-hmmm. I thought so. Then you must be his... Same game of bending heads down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Niece ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course. Naturally, when Mr. Lewis leaves, I won't see you in this hotel again. I assume you have no other uncles here. Vivian shakes her head. She suddenly seems a bit tired by the situation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good ! Then we understand each other. I would also encourage you... to dress a little more appropriately. that'll be all. Vivian raises her hands and her voice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, that's not all. That's what I was trying to do. I tried to go... get a dress on Rodeo Drive today, and the women wouldn't help me. And I have all this money now and no dress ! Vivian takes the loose jumbled banknotes from her bag and shows them to Barney.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not that I expect you to help me, but I have all of this, okay ? I have to buy a dress for dinner tonight. And nobody will help me. Barney takes the money out of Vivian's hands, then takes a white handkerchief out of the breast pocket of his jacket and gives it to Vivian. Then he gives her her money back. He walks around his desk, and picks up his telephone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, man, if you're calling the cops. Yeah, call the cops. That's great. Tell 'em I said hi.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Women's clothing. Vivian looks up, a bit surprised.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bridget, please. Vivian looks at him, and then takes the handkerchief and loudly blows her nose.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, Bridget. Hello. This is Barnard Thompson here at the Regent Beverly Wil... (HE CHUCKLES) Well, thank you. Yes, but I'd like you to do a favor for me, please. I'm sending someone over. Her name is Vivian. Vivian looks at him and smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) She's a special guest. She's the niece of a very special guest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .A. - MEETING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY Full view of a screen, on which a film is being projected. This film shows an aerial overview of the port of Long Beach and Los Angeles, with a lot of industrial buildings along the wharves.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Now, this is the jewel in Morse's crown : prime industrial properties straddling the port of Long Beach and Los Angeles. Full shot of the meeting room, with the screen in the background. Because of the dark in the room, people around the table are only shadows. Edward is standing up near the screen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) The real estate possibilities are endless, but most of the yard we'll just level. A young man, one of Philip's assistants, walks into the room and to the place where Philip is seated. He bends down to whisper to Philip.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We just got the information, Mr. Stuckey.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Edward, we just got the Morse update. Don, can you hold the projection, please ? The projection stops. Philip stands up and switches the lights on. He sighs and turns toward the young man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, what ? Speak.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Old Man Morse just got the inside track on a 350 million dollar contract to build destroyers for the Navy. Edward looks very pensive. Philip snickers, and looks at the young man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Navy contract. I can't believe this shit. I thought you said they had nothing in the hopper on this one !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I thought they didn't. Shot on another man, named Mark, seated at the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, you know, if that's true it could cost a lot more. Those stocks could go through the roof.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, no shit, Sherlock. The young man walks toward Edward, still standing up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe we're lucky to get this information now, sir. See, we can still walk away from it. Edward doesn't answer and remains pensive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Walk away ? Hey, forget it, pal. We got a thousand man- hours in on this ! Nobody's walking away from anything ! Philip sits down at the table, next to Mark.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Philip, I think he's right.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (raising his voice) Forget it, Mark. The two men start arguing, and since they are talking loudly together, we don't understand what they say. Edward, with a glass of water in his hand, comes to the table and raises his voice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gentlemen, relax ! The arguments between Philip and Mark stops
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Relax ! Who do we know on the Senate Appropriations Committee ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Senator Adams.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right, Senator Adams. Let's find out where he is. Philip stands up and the young man sits down in his chair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Navy's not going to spend 350 million dollar on anything without going to Appropriations first. He drinks his water.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't understand what's going on here today, gentlemen. The young man is on the phone, trying to reach someone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's why I hired you, Phil, to do my worrying for me. He picks up his briefcase.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll be in your office. Bob, if you want to send over the geologicals ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) No problem.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you. He goes out of the room. Philip follows him. Mark and the young blonde man sitting next to him are working on the documents in front of them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Edward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .A. - RECEPTION HALL - INTERIOR DAY Edward is about to enter Philip's private office. Philip is standing behind him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Listen, everything all set for the meeting tonight ? Edward turns around to face Philip.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mm-hmm. We hear faint voices coming from the meeting room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Yes, Senator Adams, please.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who... Who is this girl you're going with ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nobody you know. He enters Philip's private office. Philip turns around to go back in the meeting room, with a worried look on his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Yes, Edward Lewis Enterprises. Phil Stuckey. Yes, I have him right here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - WOMEN'S CLOTHING SHOP - INTERIOR DAY Full shot of the Women's clothing shop inside the hotel. Several women and even one man walking around. Counters and shelves full of women's clothing items. Hanging rails with dresses hanging on them. Vivian walks into the shop and starts looking around. Bridget comes into the shop with a Mrs Rainey, a customer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't worry, Mrs. Rainey, I'll call you the minute it comes in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Have a nice day.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you. The customer walks away and Bridget stops near Vivian who is looking at something on a counter. Closer shot of Vivian looking at her teeth in a mirror set on the counter. She makes a face and brushes something off her teeth. Bridget bends over the mirror.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello. You must be Vivian. My name's Bridget. They shake hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, hi. Barney said you'd be nice to me. They both laugh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's very sweet. What are your plans while you're in town ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're gonna have dinner. She is ready to sit on the glass covering the counter, but Bridget prevents her from doing so.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, don't sit on there, dear !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're gonna go out ? Dinner ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mm-hmm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, you'll need a cocktail dress then. Come with me. Larger shot showing the whole shop.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now, I'm sure we're gonna find something here that your uncle will love. You're a size six, right ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. How'd you know that ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, that's my job. They start walking upstairs to the upper level.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bridg, he's not really my uncle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They never are, dear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LOBBY - INTERIOR DAY Barney is going around a huge bunch of flowers, followed by two Japanese, one male and one female. The man is speaking Japanese to Barney. Vivian walks between them, carrying a garment bag over her shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Barney ! She quickly looks at the Japanese man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry, mister. Barney says a few words in Japanese to the Japanese guests.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I got a dress !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I'd rather hoped you'd be wearing it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, no, I didn't want to get it messed up ! Listen, I got shoes too. You wanna see ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, that won't be necessary. I'm sure they're quite lovely. Thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, well, listen. I didn't mean to interrupt you, but Bridget was really great... and I just wanted to say thanks. You're cool.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're welcome, Miss Vivian. She walks away, and Barney looks at her, with a slight smile on his lips.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY Medium shot of Vivian entering the room. She closes the door behind her. The phone is ringing. We see the white telephone on a low table in the forefront of the screen. Vivian drops her handbag on the floor, rushes to the phone and picks it up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .A. - RECEPTION HALL - INTERIOR DAY Medium shot of Edward, seen from the waist up, standing up in the reception hall of his office. He is on the phone. We occasionally see shadows of people moving behind him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Never, ever pick up the phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY VIVIAN Then why are you calling me ? She sits down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voicer over on the phone) Did you buy clothes today ? She squeezes the phone receiver between her head and her shoulder to have a better look at the garment bag.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I got a dress. A cocktail one.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voicer over on the phone) That's good.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .A. - RECEPTION HALL - INTERIOR DAY EDWARD I'll be in the hotel lobby, 7:45 sharp.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voicer over on the phone) What ? You're not coming up to the door ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This isn't a date. It's business.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY VIVIAN Where are you taking me, anyway ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .A. - RECEPTION HALL - INTERIOR DAY EDWARD I'm taking you to a restaurant called the Voltaire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY EDWARD (voicer over on the phone) Very elegant.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right. I'll meet you in the lobby, but only 'cause you're paying me to.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .A. - RECEPTION HALL - INTERIOR DAY EDWARD Well, thank you very much. He puts the phone down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY Vivian also puts the phone down and smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .A. - RECEPTION HALL - INTERIOR DAY Larger shot of the reception hall. We discover that Edward is standing near the reception desk, behind which a female receptionist is sitting. Behind her on the wall, a logo and underneath it : Lewis enterprises, inc., and below : Philip Stuckey - Attorney.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to the receptionist) Get her back for me, please. The receptionist picks up the phone and starts dialing. A blonde female secretary walks behind Edward and bends down to speak to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. Stuckey wanted to see you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, tell him I'm in the middle of a very important phone call. The secretary walks away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY The phone rings. Vivian walks to the low table to pick it up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .A. - RECEPTION HALL - INTERIOR DAY EDWARD (smiling on the phone) I told you not to pick up the phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY VIVIAN Then stop calling me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .A. - RECEPTION HALL - INTERIOR DAY Edward laughs and puts the phone down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY Vivian also puts the phone down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sick.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LOBBY - INTERIOR DAY Medium shot of Barney standing up in the lobby with his back to us. One of his assistant, wearing a dark suit, crosses the lobby, followed by an uniformed attendant. Vivian rushes toward Barney.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Barney ! Barney looks at her and notices she is still wearing her prostitute costume.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It didn't fit ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, no, no, no, no, no. Uh... I've got a little problem.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DINING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY High Angle Close Up Shot on a dinner table, showing a white china plate with a smaller plate inside, and on either sides of the plates, a full set of silver cutlery (three forks of various sizes on the left-hand side of the plate, and a knife and three spoons on the other side). In front of the plate, a napkin folded in a glass.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) All right, Miss Vivian, one more time. Dinner napkin. We see Vivian's hand taking the napkin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Dinner napkin...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) ...laid gently in the lap. The camera pans away and we discover Vivian seated at the table in front of the plate. She puts the napkin on her laps and then her elbows on the table
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Good. Elbows off the table. She takes her elbows off the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Don't slouch. The camera moves away from the table and we get a larger shot of the dining room. Uniformed waiters are setting tables behind Vivian and Barney, who is standing up behind Vivian. He points to the different forks on the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shrimp fork, salad fork, dinner fork.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I definitely have the salad fork. The rest of the silverware is a little confusing. The camera moves back again giving a full view of the dining room, with Barney and Vivian's table in the forefront. A black case is open on the table : inside a impressive collection of silver cutlery. Barney picks up the different forks and shows them to Vivian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right, if you get nervous, just count the tines. Four tines : dinner fork. And sometimes there are three tines in the salad fork. And sometimes...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A large grey limousine is driving slowly on Rodeo Drive, and comes to park in front of the hotel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LOBBY - INTERIOR LATE AFTERNOON Edward crosses the lobby, carrying his briefcase. He stops to look around, expecting to see Vivian waiting for him. He starts walking again, still looking around him. Barney catches up with him. Edward doesn't stop walking, and Barney has to talk while walking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pardon me, Mr. Lewis. I'm Mr. Thompson. I'm the manager of the hotel. Edward stops at a marble shelf with a row of courtesy telephones on it. He hardly listens to what Barney is telling him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh-huh. Excuse me, I just want to make one call. He picks up a telephone but keeps looking around him. He seems a bit worried.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, um, sir. I have a message for you, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: From who ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: From your niece, sir. Edward, for the first time, looks at Barney. His finger is on the dial of the phone, but he doesn't dial.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My what ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The young lady who's staying with you in your room, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh. Hmm. Edward smiles and puts down the telephone receiver which he had already put to his ear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think we both know that she's not my niece.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The reason I know that is that I am an only child.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's the message ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's waiting for you in the lounge. Intriguing young lady, Miss Vivian. Edward remains pensive for a couple of seconds before answering.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Intriguing. Edward picks up his briefcase which he had put on the telephone shelf.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Have a good evening, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you, Mr... ? He walks away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thompson. I'm the manager... He takes his business card out of the pocket of his vest to give it to Edward, but Edward is already gone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...manager of the hotel, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LOUNGE - INTERIOR NIGHT The lounge of the hotel is a cosy place with potted green plants, comfortable armchair and soft piano music. Medium shot of Edward entering the lounge. The camera then follows Edward crossing the lounge toward the bar. Larger shot of the lounge, with the bar in the background. There are not many people at this early time of the evening. Medium shot of the bar. Only one person is seated on a stool at the bar. Even if we see only her back, we guess she is Vivian. But Edward doesn't seem to recognize her, because he keeps looking around for her. As Edward is looking the other way from the bar, Vivian turns around and looks at him. Edward walks a couple of steps toward the door, and then turns around and eventually notices Vivian. Medium shot on Edward. There is a look of surprise in Edward's eyes when he recognizes Vivian. Back to Vivian still seated at the bar. She doesn't look like the Vivian we were used to see. She is wearing a very elegant dark- colored cocktail dress. Her hair also has been very elegantly styled. Edward looks at her without moving for a few seconds. She stands up from the bar and walks toward him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're late.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're stunning. She laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're forgiven.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shall we go to dinner ? He gives her his arm. She puts her arm inside his arm and they walk across the lounge toward the exit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: High angle shot of the whole restaurant. It looks like a very expensive place. Tables are scattered around the room and on the gallery, but not too close to one another. In the middle of the room, a larger table used only by the waiters. We see Edward and Vivian crossing the room, with a maitre d'hotel walking in front of them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This way, Mr. Lewis. Your party is waiting.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop fidgeting. Closer high angle shot of Vivian and Edward walking toward a table where two men, an old one and a younger one, are already seated.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. Morse. The two men stand up. The older one is James Jim Morse and the younger one is his grandson, David Morse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, Mr. Lewis. I'm Jim Morse. They shake hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This fireball is my grandson, David.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I don't know about the fireball part, but grandson is true enough.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm pleased to meet you both. This is a friend of mine, Vivian Ward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi. I'm really glad to meet you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. Morse. David. She shakes hands with both men.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please, sit. The maitre d'hotel pulls the chair for Vivian. The men wait for Vivian to be seated to sit down. Vivian has James Morse on her right, Edward on her left, and David in front of her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me. She stands up. Immediately, the maitre d'hotel pulls her chair, and the three men stand up, to Vivian's surprise.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where are you going ? She smiles to the two other men.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm going to the ladies' room. The two Morse men smile back to her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Upstairs, to the right.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. Excuse me. She starts walking away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shall I order for you ? She turns around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. She stops, exhales, and says, in a more polite tone :
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please do so. Thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll do that. She walks away. The three men sit down. Close Up shot on a plate being laid in front of one of the guests. On the plate, four appetizers, actually four canapes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Mr. Lewis, my grandfather believes the men who create a company... The camera moves up from the plate to the guest's face. The guest is Vivian, and she looks a bit worried by what has been brought to her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) ...should control its destiny. Vivian turns to Edward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where's the salad ? David looks at Vivian, a bit surprised by what she just said. Edward whispers to Vivian
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, the salad comes at the end of the meal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's the fork I knew. David smiles. Vivian takes one of her forks and looks at it, then she puts it back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Let me, uh, put it another way. Between your public statements and the rumors flying around on this thing, we find it very hard to figure out what your real intentions are. Sensing Vivian's embarrassment, James Morse smiles to her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know about you, but I've never been able to figure which goes with what ! He points to the different forks around his plate. Vivian laughs. David seems a bit annoyed by the fact that the conversation keeps on deviating on menial subjects. James Morse takes one of the canapes with his fingers and eats it. Vivian smiles, and also takes the canape with her fingers. She wipes something out of it before eating it. Edward smiles. He is happy that Vivian and James are getting along so well. Close Up on the table in front of Vivian. We see the waiter's hand putting down a plate of snails in their shells.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) You know, there was a time when we built ships the size of cities. Men like my grandfather made this country. Vivian looks at the snails and then at the waiter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who ordered this ? David seems more and more annoyed by the situation with Vivian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) The gentleman did, ma'am. Bon appetit. Edward looks at Vivian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: These are escargot. It's French for snails. It's a delicacy. Try it. David ? David bends down on the table. His grandfather looks at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. Lewis, if you were to get control... and I don't think you will... but if you did, what do you plan to do with the company ? Vivian is trying to figure out how to work the snail pincers. Edward looks at David
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Break it up and sell off the pieces. Edward is trying to mime to Vivian how to use the snail pincers. Closer shot on James Morse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sure you'll understand I'm not thrilled at the idea... of your turning forty years of my work into your garage sale. Vivian is still fighting with her snail pincers. Close Up on Vivian's plate and her hands trying to use the snail pincers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) At the price I'm paying for this stock, Mr. Morse, you are going to be a very rich man. James Morse looks at Edward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm rich enough. I just want to head my shipyard. Eventually, Vivian had succeeded in fitting one snail into the snail pincers, but it flies away from the pincers. The waiter, a white-hair man with a gentle face, catches it. Edward looks at the waiter and then at Vivian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Slippery little suckers. Both Morse gentlemen smile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (smiling) It happens all the time. Close Up on the table in front of Vivian. A ball of green ice cream, in a silver cup, is being put down on the table. Medium shot on the Morse gentlemen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I met your father. What's his name ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Carter. Vivian bits in a piece of leaf that was on the table, makes a face, and takes it out of her mouth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Yeah. Carter. Carter Lewis. Medium shot on James Morse. Then medium shots on whomever is talking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's not quite the bastard everybody says he is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I have the franchise on that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Does that make him proud ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I doubt it. It doesn't really matter now. He passed away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, I hadn't heard. I'm sorry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. Morse, you asked for this meeting. What can I do for you ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Leave my company alone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't do that. I own ten million shares.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll buy your stock back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't have the money.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We will. We're getting a contract to build ten destroyers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There will be no contract. The contract is now buried in Appropriations Committee. And it will remain there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And how the hell did you pull something like that ? You got dirty politicians in your pockets now or something ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Easy, easy, calm down. Calm down, David. Quick shots at Edward with a slight ironical smile on his face, and then at Vivian, looking embarrassed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. Lewis plays hardball.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, yes, I do. David slams his napkin on the table
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've heard enough of this. Vivian, it was a great pleasure to meet you. I'm sorry, Grandfather. I've gotta get some air. Mr. Lewis. He stands up and walks away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'd better join my grandson. You two enjoy your dinner. He stands up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sure it'll be delicious. Good luck, miss. Edward stands up. James Morse comes close to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Watch out, Lewis. I'm gonna tear you apart.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I look forward to it, sir. He walks away. Vivian looks more and more embarrassed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rich people throw their napkins a lot, don't they ? He sits down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He seems like a nice man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I guess three thousand dollars does not buy loyalty, does it ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I just mean it's sweet the way he's crazy about his grandson. Two waiters puts down plates in front of Edward and Vivian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, his grandson thinks he's a relic. He hates that he does, but he does. He makes a sign to the waiters who were wondering about the missing guests.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, just the two.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Yes, sir. From her purse, Vivian takes out a little ketchup sealed pack, as found in fast food restaurants, and starts tearing it open. Edwards looks at her and smiles. Close Up on Vivian's plate, where there are a piece of meat, a cob of corn, a jacket potato sliced in two halves, and some salad. We see Vivian's hand pouring ketchup from the pack on her meat. Medium shot on the maitre d'hotel walking toward the waiter and whispering in his ear. The waiter nods his head toward Vivian. Close Up on Vivian's plate. She spread the ketchup on her meat with her fork. The maitre d'hotel walks away, bobbing his head in a deprecating manner. Vivian looks around and senses that something is wrong. Edward smiles and looks at the waiter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's ketchup. The waiter smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Check, please.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, sir. The waiter walks away to get the check.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Haven't they ever seen ketchup before ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not in this building.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR NIGHT Close Up on Vivian's bare feet putting on leather slippers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Edward ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - TERRACE - EXTERIOR NIGHT Edward, still wearing his jacket and tie, is seated at the entrance of the terrace, the back of his chair against the open French window. Vivian walks toward him, still wearing her cocktail dress.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Edward, you said you never come out here. He looks down at the feet of his chair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I'm only halfway out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Didn't say much in the car on the way home. You thinking about dinner ? I was a maniac.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR NIGHT Medium shot of the terrace seen from the open French window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I mean, the business was good, I think. You know ? Vivian sits down on the balustrade of the terrace.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's in trouble. You want his company. He doesn't want to let it go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks for the recap.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The problem is, I think you liked Mr. Morse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - TERRACE - EXTERIOR NIGHT Edward points his finger toward Vivian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What I would like is for you to get down from there. You're making me very nervous. Please come down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's making you nervous ? What if I just leaned back a little bit like this ? She starts leaning back a little.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Would you... Would you rescue me if I fell ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vivian, I'm serious. Come... I'm not looking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's really high. She takes her hands off the balustrade, and waves them up in the air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, no hands, no hands ! Okay, all right. I'm sorry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR NIGHT The terrace seen from the open French window. She sits back and holds the balustrade with both hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The truth is, it really is totally irrelevant whether I like this man or not.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - TERRACE - EXTERIOR NIGHT EDWARD I will not let myself become emotionally involved in business.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know. Kit's always saying to me, Don't get emotional when you turn tricks. That's why no kissing. It's too personal. Edward is smiling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's like what you're saying : You stay numb, you don't get involved. When I'm with a guy, I'm like a robot. I just do it. Edward looks at her with an ironical smile on his face. Vivian sighs and smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I mean... except with you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, of course, not with me. You and I are such similar creatures, Vivian. We both screw people for money. Vivian looks embarrassed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was sorry to hear about your dad. When did he die ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Last month.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you miss him ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I hadn't spoken to him in fourteen and a half years. I wasn't there when he died.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you want to talk about this ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR NIGHT The terrace seen from the open French window. Vivian drops down from the balustrade, walks toward Edward and kneels down beside his chair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I tell you what, 'cause I got an idea.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - TERRACE - EXTERIOR NIGHT Close Shot of Edward and Vivian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's watch old movies all night. We'll just veg out in front of the TV.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Veg out ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. Be still like vegetables. Lay like broccoli. He stands up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, I'll tell you what. I'll be back. We'll do broccoli tomorrow. He strokes her chin very delicately. She stands up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where are you going ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm going downstairs for a while.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR NIGHT Later in the night. Close Up on the TV screen. We see the closing scene of the film Charade, directed in 1963 by musical comedy actor Stanley Donen. Regina (played by Audrey Hepburn) is talking with Peter (played by Cary Grant).
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over from the TV) Did you say marriage license ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over from the TV) Now, don't change the subject, just give me the stamp. Regina throws her arms around Peter's neck
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over from the TV) Oh, I love you, Adam, Alex, Peter, Brian, whatever your name is. The picture from the film, who was filling the whole TV screen, suddenly becomes a smaller one in the center of the TV screen. Four other pictures, from four other films, appears in each corner of the TV screen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over from the TV) Oh, I love you. The camera moves back and we see the back of the sofa. There is some stirring in the sofa, and we see Vivian's arm holding the remote control and pressing on a button. The TV shuts off. Close Up on Vivian's hand putting the remote control down next to a clock that says three o'clock. Medium shot on Vivian, wearing a white bathrobe, and putting her hand through her hair. She picks up the telephone next to the sofa, and presses a button on the telephone set.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi, uh, I'm in the penthouse. The guy that was here, Mr. Lewis, have you seen him down there anywhere ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LOBBY - INTERIOR DAY Medium shot on the door of the elevator. It opens, revealing Dennis, the elevator attendant, and, behind him, Vivian in her white bathrobe. He takes her by the arm and guides her away from the elevator. They cross the lobby, where, at this time of the night, there are only uniformed maids cleaning the place. Dennis guides Vivian to the door of a room, from which piano music is coming out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - MUSIC LOUNGE - INTERIOR NIGHT Full shot of the room, which is very dark. In the background, we see a stage with music stands on it. In front of the stage, Edward, in shirtsleeves, is playing on a concert piano. Closer shot on Edward playing the piano. The actor Richard Gere, who plays the character of Edward, actually plays live on the piano in that sequence. More, he composed the piece he is playing. Medium shot on the cleaning crew listening to him while working. Vivian walks slowly toward the piano. She stops behind Edward and folds her arms. Edward stops playing. Full shot of the room. The cleaning crew applauds Edward. Vivian walks closer to the piano.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you. Thank you very much.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't know you played.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I only play for strangers. Closer shot on the piano. Vivian leans on the piano.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was getting lonely upstairs all by myself. Edward turns around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gentlemen, would you mind leaving us, please ? Full shot of the room. The cleaning crew is leaving the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you. Close Up shot on Vivian's face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: People always do what you tell them to do ? Medium shot. Edward grabs Vivian by the waist and sets her in front of him. We hear the piano keys as they are pounded by Vivian's buttocks. Edward puts his forehead on Vivian's belly. Vivian, her hand on his hair, looks down at him, with a strange expression in her eyes. Edward looks up and starts untying Vivian's bathrobe belt. Under the bathrobe, Vivian is still wearing her cocktail dress. Close Up on Vivian's face as Edward lifts her dress up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I guess so. Edward grabs her, lifts her, and sits her on the piano. We hear the piano keys being pounded by Vivian's feet. Edward strokes her hair. He wants to kiss her, but she moves away. Eventually, she puts her head into his neck, and kisses him on the neck. The bathrobe has fallen down on the piano. Edward spreads Vivian's legs apart, and squeezes himself between those open legs. Vivian lies down on the piano, while Edward is having sex with her. The camera slowly moves away from the piano, giving us a full shot of the entire room. We hear the piano key being pounded, and the camera goes down behind some unspecified piece of furniture, making a fade-out to black screen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - BEDROOM - INTERIOR DAY Vivian is asleep in bed. We hear the curtains being pulled, and we see the daylight coming on Vivian's face. Vivian wakes up, scratch her head and looks around her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Wake up. Time to shop. Edward sits on the bed, and Vivian turns around to face him. Edward has a MasterCard in his hand. He shows it to Vivian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now, if you have any trouble using this card, have them call the hotel. All right ? Vivian takes the card and sits up in bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh ! More shopping. Edward ties his shoelaces.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mm-hmm. I'm surprised you didn't buy more than one dress yesterday.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wasn't as much fun as I thought it was gonna be.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why not ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They were mean to me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mean to you ? Edward looks very surprised. Vivian nods Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Medium full shot of Edward and Vivian crossing the street, holding hands. Vivian is still wearing her blue very short skirt, but the upper half of her body is covered by a white shirt, knotted at the waist and with the sleeves rolled back on her arms. She is also wearing regular woman's shoes, so she doesn't look like a prostitute any more.
direction.name: direction
