direction.raw_text: People are looking at me. They now walk on the sidewalk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're not looking at you. They're looking at me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The stores are not nice to people. I don't like it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stores are never nice to people. They're nice to credit cards. He stops walking and Vivian also stops.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, stop fidgeting.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get rid of your gum. She spits her gum, almost hitting two female pedestrians. One of them jumps up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't believe you did that. Edward pulls her by the hand and they enter an expensive clothing store.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Medium shot of Vivian and Edward standing near a hanging rail full of dresses. Edward is holding Vivian's hand, who seems a little embarrassed. A young well-dressed man approaches them : he is Mr. Hollister, the manager of the store.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am Mr. Hollister, the manager. May I help you ? Edward shakes hand with him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Edward Lewis.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, yes, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You see this young lady over here ? Vivian joins the two men with a broad smile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you have anything in this shop as beautiful as she is ? Vivian puts her head on Edward's shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, yes. Hollister understand he has made a blunder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, no ! No, no, no, I'm saying we have many things as beautiful as she would want them to be. That's the point I was getting at, and I think we can all agree with that. That's why when you came in... Edward takes Hollister's elbow and walks slightly away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me. You know what we're gonna need here ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...we knew from the first...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're gonna need a few more people helping us. I'll tell you why. We're going to be spending an obscene amount of money in here. So we're going to need a lot more help sucking up to us. That's what we really like. You understand that. Vivian smiles behind Edward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir, if I may say so, you're in the right store and the right city for that matter. Later. Medium shot of Vivian seated in a comfortable armchair with a catalogue on her laps and Hollister kneeling at her side.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anything you see here, we can do, by the way. Get ready to have some fun. Okay ? Vivian smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. Hollister makes a sign with his hand. Full shot of the store. In the forefront, Edward is standing behind a counter with a cordless telephone in his hand. He dials on the telephone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mary Pat, Mary Kate, Mary Francis, Tovah, let's see it ! He stands up. A saleswoman is running toward Vivian with a dress in her hands. She puts it on Vivian's laps, who puts the catalogue away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on. Bring it out, girls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, this is absolutely divine. Another saleswoman, also with a dress in her hand, is coming from the other side. Medium shot on Edward behind the counter. In the background, we hear female voices, but we don't understand the words. Hollister walks toward Edward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me, sir, uh,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Exactly how obscene an amount of money were you talking about ? Just profane or really offensive ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really offensive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I like him so much ! Edward takes the phone to his ear, and Hollister walks away. We hear the orchestral music from the title song : Pretty Woman Vivian is still seated on her armchair, looking at all the clothes that the saleswomen are bringing to her. She has a very bright red dress in her hand and she looks at Edward. Edward makes a face and nods No. A saleswoman put a black hat on Vivian's head. Edward smiles and nods Yes. Hollister sits down near Vivian and a saleswoman brings a grey dress. Vivian points to the dress and looks at Edward. Edward makes a face and a So-So sign with his hand. Slightly later. Edward is standing near the counter, drinking coffee. In the background, we see Vivian surrounded by saleswomen. Hollister walks toward Edward. The music stops.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. Lewis, sir. Mr. Lewis, how's it going so far ? Pretty well, I think.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think we need some major sucking up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Very well, sir. You're not only handsome, but a powerful man. I could see the second you walked in here, you were someone to reckon with... Edward has put the coffee cup down and has taken the telephone again. He turns toward Hollister.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hollister.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not me. Her. He points toward the group of saleswomen surrounding Vivian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry, sir. I'm sorry. He walks away from Edward and toward the group of saleswomen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How we doing, ladies ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .A. - PHILIP'S ROOM - INTERIOR DAY Philip sits down behind his desk and talks into the hand-free telephone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, Edward, Edward. Where the hell are you ? The word's all over the street.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Close shot of Edward on the phone, with Vivian trying on new clothes in the background.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over on the phone) Morse is gonna raise your offer, pal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's countering ? (LAUGHING) God, he is a tough old bird.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .A. - PHILIP'S ROOM - INTERIOR DAY EDWARD (voice over on the phone) He knows the navy contracts are stalled. Where's he gonna get the money ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know. He, uh... I think he's throwing in with the employees.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - INTERIOR DAY EDWARD He still needs someone to underwrite the paper.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .A. - PHILIP'S ROOM - INTERIOR DAY EDWARD (voice over on the phone) Find out who it is. I'll be in the office in an hour.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, okay. You got it. He presses a button on the telephone set to cut the call.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Edward gives his credit card to Vivian. Vivian is now dressed in a very elegant brown suit, with a grey shirt underneath.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're on your own. I have to go back to work. You look great ! He walks toward the exit of the store, and near Hollister.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She has my card.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And we'll help her use it, sir. Slightly later. We hear the song Oh, Pretty Woman, performed by Roy Orbison. Vivian, wearing a black short dress, is dancing on the rhythm of the music, surrounded by two saleswomen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pretty woman walking down the street. Vivian comes out of a dressing cubicle, wearing a black sweater and brown pants.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pretty woman the kind I like to meet. Pretty woman. Close Up shot of Vivian's back putting a beige silk blouse on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't believe you. You're not the truth. Vivian, wearing a light pink suit, whirls round.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No one could look as good as you. Mercy. Vivian, wearing a white blouse, looks at some pieces of lingerie. Vivian, wearing a brown dress with white dots, whirls round. Close Up of Vivian's leg putting hoses on. The volume of the music goes down. Another department of the store : the shoe department. Vivian, wearing a white suit with thin vertical stripes, is surrounded by shoes. Hollister is kneeling beside her, and a salesman is helping her try a new pair of shoes. Vivian smiles and looks at the necktie worn by the salesman.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Edward would love that tie. Hollister turns toward his salesman.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Would you give her the tie ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The tie ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take off the tie. Give her the tie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The tie. He starts taking off his tie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He really wants to do this, by the way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He would go crazy about this tie. A saleswoman walks toward them, carrying a large pizza in an open cardboard box. Hollister looks worried.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who ordered pizza ? But Vivian seems very happy about the pizza. The volume of the music goes back up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Close Up on a white parasol with flowers printed on it, looking a bit Japanese. The parasol moves away from us and we discovers we are back on Rodeo Drive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pretty woman, stop a while. The camera moves away from the parasol, and Vivian appears on the screen. She is wearing a very elegant white suit, long white gloves, and a black hat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pretty woman, talk a while. Pretty woman give your smile to me. The camera backs up away from Vivian, and we notice she is carrying several bags, certainly full of clothes. Men turn their head to look at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pretty woman Yeah, yeah, yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We are back inside the boutique, from which Vivian was very rudely ejected, the day before, by some snobbish saleswomen. Through the shop window, we see Vivian walking on the sidewalk. She stops and looks inside the boutique.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pretty woman, look my way. The camera moves from the window to the street door of the boutique.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pretty woman, say you'll stay with me. The volume of the music goes down, as Vivian enters the shop. Saleswoman # 2 walks toward her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: May I help you ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, thank you. Vivian keeps on walking until she reaches Saleswoman # 1, who is working on a hanging rail. Saleswoman # 1 was the one who actually ejected Vivian from the boutique.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello. The saleswoman has a broad smile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you remember me ? Apparently, the saleswoman doesn't recognize this very elegant woman as being the one she was rude to the day before.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I'm sorry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was in here yesterday. You wouldn't wait on me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You work on commission, right ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, yes. Vivian shows her all the bags she is carrying.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Big mistake. Big. Huge ! I have to go shopping now. She walks away, leaving the saleswoman with a very surprised look on her face. The volume of the music goes back up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LOBBY - INTERIOR DAY A uniformed attendant enters the lobby, carrying Vivian's shopping bags. Behind him Vivian walks in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pretty woman don't walk on by. The camera moves across the lobby, until it reaches Barney, the managers, talking to two of his employees, one uniformed male and one female. He has not noticed Vivian yet, because she is coming behind him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pretty woman don't make me cry. Pretty woman. Suddenly he sees her, and immediately stops talking to his employees. Reverse angle shot of Vivian's back, walking behind the uniformed attendant, toward the elevator.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't walk away, hey. Reverse angle shot on Barney, smiling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY Medium shot. Vivian has put the bags she was carrying on the table, but has kept her purse, a vey elegant black leather item. She opens it, takes some money out of it, and gives the money to the uniformed attendant, who helped her carry her shopping bags. The attendant smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait... Thank you. The attendant walks away. Vivian takes her hat off and falls into an armchair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, oh, pretty woman. End of the music.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .A. - EXTERIOR DAY The modern building, where Edward's office in L.A. is located. The number above the main entrance says 333. We hear male voices over. We don't understand everything they are saying.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Mister Lewis.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Gentlemen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .A. - MEETING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY Edward is standing up with his briefcase, smiling to the men of his team around him. He moves to his chair at the meeting table. Philip is trying to herd all his assistants out of the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fellas, let's finish this up this afternoon, huh ? Edward sits down. A blonde secretary joins the leaving group.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jake, set something up with Blair. Around two o'clock, two- thirty, would be good. They all go out, leaving Edward and Philip alone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You were right about Morse. He mortgaged everything he owns, right down to his underwear, to secure a loan from the bank. He sits down next to Edward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And it's not just any bank. Plymouth Trust, huh ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hmm. Edward seems to be very pensive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, it goes without saying... that your business means a lot more to them than our friend, Mr. Morse. So, all you gotta do is call the bank. He puts his hands on the telephone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. Still, a very tepid reaction from Edward. He just takes a small glass and puts it in front of him on the table. Philip looks at Edward with a worried look. He stands up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Edward, excuse me for saying this, but what the hell is wrong with you this week ? Are you giving Morse a chance to get away ? Edward has put another glass on top of the first one, and now he puts a third one on top of the two other ones.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know what I used to love when I was a kid, Phil ? He puts a fourth glass on top of the other ones. Philip sighs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blocks. Building blocks. Erector sets.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, I liked Monopoly. Boardwalk, Park Place. Wh-What's the point ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We don't build anything, Phil. We don't make anything.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We make money, Edward. We worked for a year on this deal. It's what you said you wanted. I'm handing it to you. Edward looks up at Philip.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Morse's jugular is exposed. It's time for the kill. Let's finish this. Call the bank ! He moves the telephone toward Edward. Edward just smiles but doesn't pick up the phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR NIGHT Close Up on a big Hi-Fi tuner-amplifier. We see Vivian's hand setting the power on. Lights appear on the amplifier screen. A sign says 102.70 Mhz. We hear some soft easy music. Vivian's hand sets the volume a little higher. Medium shot on a table, on which everything has been set for a dinner for two. Three candlesticks with lighted red candles in them are also set on the table. Vivian is seated on one of the chair by the table. We see her from the back, but she seems to be almost naked, except for what looks like a tie around her neck. We hear a door opening, and then closing. Vivian puts her feet up on the table. She is wearing black shoes. She puts the end of the tie on the table : it is the tie she took from the salesman in the store. Edward crosses the room, without apparently noticing Vivian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How was your day, dear ? Edward stops and looks at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nice tie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I got it for you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - BATHROOM - INTERIOR NIGHT Close up shot on the bathtub faucet. We see Vivian's foot reaching for the faucet, and the thumb of the foot trying to fit inside the faucet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Well, my mother was a music teacher... and married my father... Close Up on Edward naked chest floating in the bathtub. Vivian's hand is rubbing a washcloth on the chest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) ...whose family was extremely wealthy. Medium shot on Vivian lying in the tub with Edward lying on top of her. Her legs are spread open and her knees comes out of the water on either side of Edward's body.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then he divorced my mother to be with another woman. And he took his money with him. Vivian puts the washcloth down on the edge of the tub. She takes a sponge. Close Up shot on Edward's chest. Vivian rubs it with the sponge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) And then she died. I was very angry with him. Medium shot of the tub seen from the foot of the tub.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It cost me ten thousands dollars in therapy to say that sentence : I was very angry with him. I do it very well, don't I ? I'll say it again. I was very angry with him. Vivian laughs, and Edward smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello, my name is Mr. Lewis. I'm very angry with my father. The camera moves slowly around the bathtub.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I would've been angry at the ten thousands dollars.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My father was president of the third company I ever took over. I bought it. I sold it off piece by piece.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What'd the shrink say ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He said I was cured. Now the camera has come near the faucet. Edward takes Vivian's hand in his.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, so you got even. That must've made you happy. Medium shot of Edward and Vivian in the tub.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did I mention my leg is 44 inches from hip to toe, so, basically, we're talking about 88 inches of therapy... She brings her feet up and wraps her legs around Edward's body.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...wrapped around you for the bargain price of...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & VIVIAN (together) ...three thousands dollars.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Close Up shot on the lawn of the polo field. We hear an air-horn blowing, and horses galloping. The small polo white ball is in the middle of the shot. We see the hooves of several horses approaching the ball. Then a mallet comes down and strikes the ball away. Medium shot on horse-backed players galloping on the field. We hear the announcer on the Public Address.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over from the P.A.) Ebersol of the Falcons passes to Kennan. Full shot of the field, with the camera on ground level, showing the horses coming toward us. Full shot of the players on the field.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over from the P.A.) This is Bill Fricker with Gwen Olsen... Medium shot of spectators watching the game. They are all very well-dressed, and evidently belong to the upper class of society.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over from the P.A.) ...giving you play-by-play of this marvelous charity event. Full shot of a lawn used as a parking lot with car parked among people sitting in folding chairs and picnicking. Philip and his wife Elizabeth are crossing the lawn. Philip is carrying a basket and Elisabeth is carrying a large piece of printed cloth, to be used as a tablecloth to picnic on it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Watch where you're walking, because, if you step in something, we're not going back in the car. Elizabeth is ready to set the cloth at the foot of a tree.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not too near the tree. I don't like the ants. Polo players are galloping in the background. A couple approaches Philip and Elizabeth. They all shake hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello. Have you seen Edward anywhere ? Medium shot on Edward and Vivian standing near a car. Edward is wearing a very elegant light-grey suit, and Vivian is wearing the brown dress with white dots that we've seen her buy on Rodeo Drive. She's also wearing a very elegant beige hat with a ribbon matching her dress. And Edward is wearing the necktie Vivian gave him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What if someone recognizes me ? Larger shot of the couple.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not likely. They don't spend too much time on Hollywood Boulevard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You did. He puts his hands around Vivian's waist, to grab her hands behind her back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on. Let go. Let go. She eventually let him take her hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right. You look great. You look like a lady. You're gonna have a wonderful time. Medium shot on the couple. She makes a face. He takes her hand and drags her behind him
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. Don't fidget and smile. She makes a broad smile, and walks behind him. Close shot on the players on the field.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over from the P.A.) Humboldt's coming around to this side. On the edge of the field, two well-dressed gentlemen, a young one and and older one, are watching the game.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over from the P.A.) Toquenee is on Kennan. Penalty on that play. The two gentlemen walk away from the field. The camera follows them around a platform with a canopy above it. On the platform, the announcer, a white-haired gentleman, is sitting at a table in front of a microphone. On the other side of the platform, the camera lets the two gentlemen go on their way and stops on a group of four people : Edward, Vivian, Gwen and Gretchen. The two last ones are the Olsen sisters, two very elegant blonde women, known to be the gossip champions of Los Angeles upper class society. Gwen is seated on a chair on the platform, next to the announcer, when Gretchen is standing at the foot of the platform.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is Gwen and Gretchen, the infamous Olsen sisters, who have made marrying well an art form.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Edward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Be back in just a second. Hold on. He walks away and Vivian remains with the Olsen sisters. In the background, a waiter is working on a buffet table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, you're the flavor of the month. Hmm. She turns back to the man seated in front of the microphone. Vivian looks a little disturbed by what Gwen just said.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, she's just being testy. Edward's our most eligible bachelor. Everybody is trying to land him. Vivian nods her head and answers Gretchen with a sardonic tone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I'm not trying to land him. I'm just using him for sex. She walks away. Gretchen laughs. Medium shot on the edge of the field. A middle-aged couple is seated on two chairs and looks at the game. Edward is standing behind them. The couple claps their hands and yell to support their favorite team. Vivian joins Edward behind the couple. Edward claps his hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well done. Vivian claps her hands louder than Edward, and then yells with wide movements of her hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well done. Whoo, whoo, whoo ! Close shot on the couple, who turns around to look at her. Close shot on Edward and Vivian
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell me again why we're here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Business.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Business mingling ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. We hear an air-horn blowing noisily. Close Up on the field. We see the legs of a horse galloping on the field.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over from the P.A.) That's the chukker, ladies and gentlemen. Larger shot on the field with the horses galloping on it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over from the P.A.) Falcons, seven. Gems, four. Medium shot on a group of spectators under an open tent. Among them, Philip, with sunglasses on his nose, and a glass of Champagne in his hand. He leaves the group.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me. Edward ! Larger shot on another open tent across the lawn from the other one. Philip comes in and joins his wife.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Edward. Over here. Edward walks in with Vivian. He shakes hands with Philip.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Phil.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, good to see you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Me too. I want you to meet a new friend of mine, Vivian Ward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, hi. Philip Stuckey, Vivian. This is my wife, Elizabeth. Vivian shakes hands with Philip, then with Elizabeth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's always a pleasure meeting one of Edward's girls. A very elegant blonde lady walks toward them and then away from them. Elizabeth turns around to look at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, my God ! It's Tate Whitley Wallington. She runs after Tate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tate ! It's me, Elizabeth, from Workout World. The two men and Vivian watch her go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sort of an aerobics queen. Feel the burns. Well, let me get you something to drink. Vivian, why don't you start with that. Okay ? He gives his Champagne glass to Vivian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll be right back. Did you notice Senator Adams is here ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mm-hmm. I asked him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That is why I have pledged my eternal love to you. Mmm ! He walks away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Real genuine guy. Who is he ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's my lawyer. He's all right.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You could freeze ice on his wife's ass.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe we'll try that later.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are these people your friends ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I spend time with them, yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, no wonder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No wonder what ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No wonder why you came looking for me. Medium shot on the announcer's platform. Gwen Olsen is speaking in the microphone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And I do need some help from you ladies and gentlemen in the audience. Medium shot on a group of spectators, who are walking under the white ribbon which separates the audience from the polo field.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over from the P.A.) We need you to help replace some of the divots out here on the grass. Medium shot on guests seated around a table. They all stand up, some still carrying their glass of Champagne.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over from the P.A.) So come on out now. Medium full shot on the field. All those very elegant people from the upper class society, with their glass of Champagne in hand, stomps, with their feet, on the divots on the field.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over from the P.A.) Come on ! Come on, folks. Close shot on the feet of the guests, stomping on the divots.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over from the P.A.) You heard her. The stomping of the divots. Close Up on a very elegant high-heel shoe putting a divot back in place. Medium full shot of the announcer's platform. The white-haired gentleman is sitting at the table on the platform, with Gwen at his side. But he is not talking in the microphone. Another bearded man, standing in front of the platform, is talking in a wireless microphone. In front of the platform, people are walking under the white ribbon to go on the field.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is a time-honored tradition, ladies and gentlemen. Medium full shot of Philip, alone in front of a row of empty white folding chairs, sneezing and blowing his nose into a white handkerchief.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over from the P.A.) As old as the game of polo itself. Long high-angle shot of the field, where the guests are stomping the divots. Close shot on Vivian, without her hat, stomping the divots and smiling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over from the P.A.) Kings and queens used to do this. Medium shot on Elizabeth, with a glass of Champagne in hand, talking to Edward
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's sweet, Edward. Back on Vivian, stomping the divots.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Wherever did you find her ? Back on Edward and Elizabeth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Elizabeth looks a bit surprised by Edward's joke. Back on Vivian stomping the divots. Edward joins her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over from the P.A.) Only one word of advice : Avoid the steaming divot ! Medium shot of Philip, seated on a chair, and looking at Vivian and Edward. Back to Vivian and Edward stomping the divots. Vivian laughs very loudly, and Edward takes her in his arms. Close shot on Philip, who seemed worried by what he sees. Medium full shot of Vivian seated on the trunk of a red convertible car. Her hat is on the trunk near her. A man takes one of Vivian's shoes off to clean it. A woman is standing near the car, watching the scene.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, it's all part of the game of polo. You get to have your shoes polished by a member of the club. He looks at a dirty spot on the shoe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think I got something in the car that will buff that up. He walks away with the shoe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you. Medium shot on David Morse walking toward Vivian. He is wearing his polo player outfit : red shirt, with the name of his team L.A. Gems and his number in the team 2, and white pants. He is holding his helmet, his leather gloves and his riding crops in one hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vivian, hi. David Morse. Medium shot of Vivian, still seated on the car. She smiles. The woman, who was talking with her, walks away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me. Vivian takes her hat, jumps from the car down on the ground, and walks toward David.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: David.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How are you ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm okay. David looks at the hat Vivian is holding
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I thought that was you. I like this hat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's new. Medium shot on Philip watching Vivian talking with David Morse. His wife Elizabeth joins him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Yeah ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Yeah !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you looking at ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Edward's date. Reverse angle shot on what Philip sees : David and Vivian talking together, seen from a distance. We can't hear what they are saying.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) I'm going for a ride with the Ritter's in their new car. Okay, hon ? Back on Philip. Elizabeth gives Philip a kiss on the cheek
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh-huh. Elizabeth understands that Philip has not heard a word of what she just said.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Philip, I'm going to rip off all my clothes and do a naked belly dance for the polo players.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Have fun. Elizabeth walks away, looking a bit furious. Back on Vivian and David, as watched by Philip. They are now standing in front of David's horse, held by a young blonde girl.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come meet my horse, Vivian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, Edward's waiting for me. I don't want to...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on. He's right here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, I'll... Just for a second, though. She walks toward the horse, looking back to watch for Edward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't know you were playing today. Medium shot of Philip and Edward walking between the stands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh... I was asking for directions. There she was.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, so you just ran into her ? That's great, Jesus !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So anyway, what does she do ? Does she... does she work ? They stop walking in front of a stand, where waiters are pouring Champagne for the guests.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's in sales.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sales ? That's terrific. That's good. What does she sell ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why do you want to know ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now just hear me out on this, okay ? I've known you a long time. I... I see some differences in you this week, like the tie, and, uh... I'm wondering if maybe this girl isn't the difference, especially when I see her talking to David Morse. Different angle medium shot showing, behind Edward's back, Vivian to David in the background. Edward turns around to look at them. Medium close shot on Edward looking at Vivian, and Philip, looking at Edward, with an inquisitive expression in his eye. Closer shot on David and Vivian talking together near the horse, still held by the young girl.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) I introduced them at dinner the other night.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) So what ? Now they're best friends ? Back on Edward and Philip talking together.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I mean, this girl appears from out of nowhere. Now she's talking to a guy whose company we're trying to buy. That's a little convenient, don't you think ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't be ridiculous.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Edward, how... how do you know that this girl... hasn't attached herself to you because she's bringing information back to Morse ? This happens ! Industrial espionage...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Phil, Phil, Phil ! Phil, listen to me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's not a spy. She is a hooker.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She is a hooker. I picked her up on Hollywood Boulevard. In your car. Philip laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, you are...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, man ! He keeps on laughing louder. He snorts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, you're the only millionaire I ever heard of... who goes looking for a bargain basement streetwalker, you know ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Edward !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry I told you. Edward walks toward Senator Adams, who is calling him. Philip keeps on laughing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Senator. Senator Adams, I'm pleased you could make it. Medium shot on the Senator. Edward walks to him and shakes his hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you. I hope the information I gave you was helpful. Back on Philip, who walks away with a laughing face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Oh, absolutely, yes, and thank you for it. Back on Edward with the senator.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's no change, is there ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, it's still bogged down. Medium shot on Vivian, standing near a tree, with her hat in her hand. She is smiling. Philip walks behind her. Vivian stops smiling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Having a nice time, Vivian ? She smiles again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, I'm having a great time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Must be quite a change from Hollywood Boulevard, hmm ? She stops smiling and shows a very sad and worried face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, Edward told me. But don't worry : you're secret is safe with me. Listen, maybe, uh, you and I could get together sometime... He touches her bare arm with his sunglasses.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...after Edward leaves.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, sure. Why not ? We sense that Vivian feels like crying, but she masters her emotions and looks at Philip.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'll just have to do that, hmm ? He puts the tip of his fingers on her bare shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Philip ! Philip turns around to look at his wife. Then he walks away. Vivian remains on the same spot, with a very sad face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over from the P.A.) Hi, tailgaters. I'd like to mention a couple of our silver sponsors... Close shot on Edward looking at Vivian. He smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over from the P.A.) ...Jacobs Distributors, Norrell Saddlery, and we'd like to give a great big thanks to our platinum sponsor... Back to Vivian. She doesn't look at Edward and keeps the same sullen sad face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over from the P.A.) Edward Lewis Enterprises. Applause and air horn blowing. Vivian crosses her arms, but doesn't look at Edward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over from the P.A.) The ball is in for chukker number four.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR EVENING Medium shot on the main door. It opens and Edward comes in, followed by Vivian. Vivian closes the door, and Edward looks at his mail lying on a small table. Vivian throws her hat and gloves on another table with a nervous movement. Edward turns around to look at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You all right ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm fine. She walks away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fine. That's good. Seven fines since we left the match. Edward picks up his mail and newspaper, and walks behind her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Could I have another word, please ? The camera follows Edward in the room. In the background, across the open door of the bedroom, we see Vivian entering the bathroom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Asshole ! There's a word. She slams the bathroom door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think I liked fine better. Edward drops his mail and newspapers on the desk. Vivian opens the bathroom door, and stands near the open door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know what ? Just tell me one thing : Why did you make me get all dressed up ? Edward walks toward her. The camera follows him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, for one thing, the clothing was appropriate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - BEDROOM - INTERIOR EVENING Edward takes his jacket off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, what I mean is, if you were gonna tell everybody I'm a hooker, - why didn't you just let me wear my own clothes, okay ? Edward sits down on the bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I did not... I did not...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I mean, in my own clothes, when someone like that guy Stuckey comes up to me, I can handle it, I'm prepared. Edward starts unlacing his shoes. Vivian walks away toward the living room. The camera follows her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR EVENING Vivian is trying unsuccessfully to open a bottle of Coca-Cola. In the background, Edward is still sitting on the bed, taking his shoes off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm very sorry. I'm not happy with Stuckey at all for saying or doing that. But he is my attorney. I've known him for ten years. Edward stands up and walks toward Vivian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He thought you were some kind of an industrial spy. The guy's paranoid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you, my pimp now ? She puts the unopened bottle back on the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, you think you can pass me around to your friends ? I'm not some little toy ! She walks away toward the bedroom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, you're not my toy, I know you're not my toy. He walks behind her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vivian ! Vivian, I'm speaking to you. Come back here !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - BEDROOM - INTERIOR EVENING Vivian was ready to enter the bathroom, but she turns around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I hate to point out the obvious, but you are, in fact, a hooker ! And you are my employee !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, you don't own me. I decide, okay ? I say who. I say when. I... I say who...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I refuse to spend the next three days fighting with you. I said I was sorry. I meant it. That's the end of it !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry I ever met you. She walks away into the bathroom
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry I ever got into your stupid car ! He walks toward the bathroom, enters it and starts taking his tie off in front of the mirror.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As if you had so many more appealing options. Vivian comes back to the bathroom door, carrying a bunch of clothes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've never had anyone make me feel as cheap as you did today.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Somehow, I find that very hard to believe. She gets out of the bathroom with her arms full of clothes. She picks up a small handbag and puts it on her shoulder. Then she tries to pick up a larger handbag. Close shot on the handbag, stuck under an armchair. We notice that Vivian is bare feet. Vivian finally succeeds in picking up the bag and put the straps over her shoulder, on top of the smaller bag. Edward walks out of the bathroom and joins her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where are you going ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want my money. I want to get out of here. She crosses her arms on her bunch of clothes. She has a very sullen, sad face. Edward doesn't move for a couple of seconds, then walks to the bed, to pick up his jacket. He gets his wallet from the inside pocket of his jacket. He opens the wallet, and gets a large wad of banknotes out of it. Close up shot on the bed. We see the wad of banknotes falling on the bed. They are all hundred-dollar bills. Edward walks away toward the living room, and Vivian remains without moving with her sullen sad face. She looks down at the bed. Close up shot on the wad of banknotes on the bed. Back to Vivian, who hasn't moved. She starts walking away toward the living room, without taking her money.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR EVENING Edward is standing near the desk, looking at his mail. Vivian walks behind him, coming from the bedroom and going away toward the front door. We hear the door opening. Edward looks up toward the door. The door closes, and Edward looks very pensive. He looks back into the bedroom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - BEDROOM - INTERIOR EVENING Close up on the bed, where the wad of banknotes is still lying.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - PENTHOUSE HALLWAY - INTERIOR EVENING Medium shot on Vivian, standing near the elevator, and nervously pressing on the elevator call button.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on ! Medium close shot on Vivian. We hear the penthouse door opening, but Vivian doesn't look at it and keeps looking at the elevator in front of her. Larger shot. Edward is coming out of the penthouse, and he has left the door open. He walks toward Vivian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry. I wasn't prepared to answer questions about us. It was stupid and cruel. I didn't mean it. I don't want you to go. Will you stay the week ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I saw you talking to David Morse. I didn't like it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We were just talking. He chuckles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't like it. The elevator bell dings. The elevator door opens, and a smiling Dennis appears.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Down ? Close shot on Edward's face, and then on Vivian's face. Dennis feels some tension between Edward and Vivian and stops smiling. He goes back into the elevator, presses a button and the door closes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You hurt me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't do it again. They look at each other for a couple of seconds, then slowly, Vivian walks back to the penthouse. Edward follows her and takes one of her handbags from her shoulder. They both enters the penthouse and he closes the door behind him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - BEDROOM - INTERIOR NIGHT High angle shot above the bed. Edward and Vivian are lying in the bed, presumably naked, but covered by a sheet from their waist down. They are facing each other and talking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: First guy I ever loved was a total nothing. Second was worse. My mom called me a bum magnet. If there was a bum within a fifty-mile radius, I was completely attracted to him. That's how I ended up here. I followed bum number three. Slowly, the camera moves closer to them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So here I was : no money, no friends, no bum.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So then you chose this as your profession ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I worked at a couple fast food places, parked cars at wrestling. And I couldn't make the rent. I was too ashamed to go home. That's when I met Kit. She was a hooker and made it sound so great. So one day I did it. The camera stops moving forward, having reached a medium close shot, showing Vivian and Edward's heads and shoulders.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I cried the whole time. But then I got some regulars and, you know... It's not like anybody plans this. It's not your childhood dream.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You could be so much more. Close shot on Vivian's face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: People put you down enough, you start to believe it. Reverse shot on Edward's face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think you are a very bright, very special woman. Reverse shot on Vivian's face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The bad stuff is easier to believe. You ever notice that ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .A. - EXTERIOR DAY Long shot on the building, seen from across the street.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .A. - RECEPTION HALL - INTERIOR DAY Medium full shot on Philip, standing in front of the desk, and talking to the receptionist girl.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I don't want to talk to him now. Tell him I'll call him on Monday. He walks away from the desk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, sir. A blonde female secretary walks into the room, carrying a thick pile of documents.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where are you going ? Did he sign these ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, he said he had to leave. Philip walks nervously across the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He had to... He meets Edward coming out of an office.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Edward, you can't disappear now. We're in this too deep.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't panic, Philip. Morse isn't going anywhere. I'll be back here in the morning. He stops at the reception desk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you send the tickets to the hotel ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you. He starts walking out of the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where are you going ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have a date.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: With the hooker ? Edward stops walking. He doesn't seem very happy by what Philip just said. He slowly turns around, facing Philip.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Be careful, Philip. He walks away. Philip slowly turns around and walks into his office.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR EVENING Medium shot of Edward standing in front of the closed bedroom door. He is very elegantly dressed in black tuxedo and bow-tie. When he hears the bedroom door opening, he crosses his arm and leans on the bar. The door opens and Vivian appears. She is very elegantly dressed in a long red evening dress. She is also wearing long white gloves. She walks into the room. She stops in front of Edward and faces him. Edward moves around her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do I look okay ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mmm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mmm ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Something's missing. She looks at herself and at her tight-fitting dress.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, nothing else is gonna fit into this dress. I'll tell you that. Edward picks up a mauve-colored box on the bar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, maybe something in this box. I don't want you to get too excited. This is only on loan. He opens the box : it's a jewel box. Vivian comes closer to the box and looks into it. What she sees looks like a very beautiful and expensive necklace. She moves her hand to touch delicately the necklace, but Edward snaps the lid of the box shut, almost squeezing her finger into it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh ! She bursts out laughing loudly. Edward opens the box again. Close shot in front of a mirror. Edward is fixing the necklace around Vivian's neck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They really let you borrow this from the jewelry store ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm a very good customer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you were gonna buy this, how much would it cost ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Quarter of a million. Vivian laughs nervously.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A quarter of a million dollars ? Edward turns around Vivian, and his black-colored back blocks completely our view of the scene, making some sort of fade-out / fade-in with the next scene.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - ELEVATOR - INTERIOR EVENING Edward's back is still blocking completely our view of the scene. But then Edward moves to stand beside Vivian in the back of the cabin of the elevator. She is carrying a small golden purse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, where are we going ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a surprise.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If I forget to tell you later, I had a really good time tonight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you. Close shot on Dennis standing near the door of the cabin, and smiling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LOBBY - INTERIOR EVENING We hear the beginning of the orchestral music of Fallen, written and performed by Lauren Wood. Vivian and Edward are getting out of the elevator and they start crossing the lobby. Dennis comes out of the elevator to have a better look. Medium full shot on a desk. Two uniformed attendant are standing near the desk. Another man, wearing a suit, is standing behind the desk, and checking things in an open ledger. All three of them look at the passing couple. Vivian and Edward keep on walking across the lobby. He looks at her. She touches her necklace. Medium shot on the reception desk. Miss Wilson and another female receptionist are standing behind the desk, talking with a guest. They look at the couple and smile. Barney is standing near a wall tapestry, talking to a guest. He looks at the couple and seems very happy by what he sees. Back on Vivian and Edward crossing the lobby.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When you're not fidgeting, you look very beautiful... and very tall. Vivian laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The big grey limousine, that Edward uses all the time, is leaving the curb in front of the hotel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're a dream coming true. I can't believe how I have... Close shot on the front left wheel of the limousine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...fallen for you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Long shot of the airport. The limousine enters the airport field, and stops near a corporate jet plane. A red carpet is lying on the ground between the limousine and the plane.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are the one who's led me to the sun. Medium full shot on the car. Edward comes out of the back of the limousine. Darryl comes out of the driver's door and holds the door for Vivian, who looks surprised to see the plane.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How could I know...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't want to go to San Francisco in a limousine, do you ? Darryl closes the back door, and stands near the car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...I was lost without you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've never been on a plane before.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And I want to tell you... Edward walks, on the red carpet, toward the plane, followed by Vivian. They talk together, but the lyrics of the song cover their voices.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...you control my brain. Long shot on the runway, with the corporate jet plane taking off. The camera follows the plane.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And you should know that...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The jet plane is flying above L.A., with the sun setting down in the background.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...you are life in my veins.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Well, it should be a pretty smooth flight, Mr. Lewis. The weather is clear all the way up to San Francisco. We should be there in about fifty minutes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - AERIAL VIEW - EXTERIOR NIGHT Extreme long aerial shot of San Francisco.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Medium long shot of the main entrance of the opera house, with the cars coming and going and dropping the spectators. End of the music.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LOBBY - INTERIOR NIGHT Full shot on the lobby, which is almost empty. Apparently, Edward and Vivian are among the last spectators. Vivian, who seems a bit nervous, is holding Edward's arm very tightly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're late.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, it's all right. Opening night never starts on time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. They walk near a stand, where a girl, wearing black tuxedo and bow-tie, is distributing programs. Edward takes a program.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Program, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - BOX - INTERIOR NIGHT The camera pans, from right to left, a succession of private boxes in the medium upper level of the theatre. All the men are wearing black tuxedoes and bow-ties, and all the women are wearing very elegant and very expensive evening dresses. We hear the instruments of the orchestra warming up. The third box is empty, but an usher shows Edward and Vivian through the door of the box.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right this way, Mr. Lewis, sir. Vivian enters first, followed by Edward. Vivian looks down from the balustrade of the box. Edward shakes hand with Doris, an old lady in the next box.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Doris.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Edward, how are you ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How nice to see you. Nice to see you. The camera starts going away and down from the box.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir. He shakes hands with Doris' husband.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good evening, Edward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wonderful news. Congratulations. Meanwhile, Vivian has moved to the corner of the balustrade.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, come here. You gotta look at this. Medium close shot on the box. Edward, who, as we already know it, is afraid of heights, doesn't want to move any closer to the balustrade.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's all right. I've already seen it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you're afraid of heights, why do you get seats up here ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because they're the best. He sits down, and Vivian also sits down. The ushers, who had remained behind them, slightly bends down toward Edward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is there anything else, sir ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, thank you. He shows them something underneath the balustrade, and then moves away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The glasses are there. Enjoy the opera.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh ! She picks up the opera glasses.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, you said this is in Italian. She tries to look through the glasses, but doesn't succeed in setting them right on their handle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mm-hmmm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So how am I gonna know what they're singing. These are broken. Edward takes the glasses from Vivian's hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mine are broken.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, no. That's okay It's all right. He sets them right on their handle, and gives them back to Vivian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You'll know. Believe me, you'll understand. Vivian looks through the glasses, while the lights are switching off and on, to warn the spectators that the opera is about to begin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The music's very powerful. Mediums full shot on the two next boxes on the right of Edward's box. The spectators, who understood the lights signal, are sitting down. Back to Edward's box. Medium close shot on Vivian and Edward. Vivian is looking through her glasses.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's a band ! Medium shot on the two other boxes. The light are definitely switched off, and ushers are closing the curtains on the exit doors. Back to Vivian and Edward. We hardly see them in the dark.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: People's reactions to opera the first time they see it is very dramatic. They either love it or they hate it. If they love it, they will always love it. If they don't, they may learn to appreciate it, but it will never become part of their soul.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mmm. The orchestra plays the overture of La Traviata. The lights, coming from the stage, enable us to see Vivian and Edward's faces. Vivian is smiling broadly. Edward is concentrated on the music and serious. Close shot on Vivian's face. Still smiling broadly, she turns briefly toward Edward, and then goes back looking at the stage. She bends down on the balustrade to have a better look at the stage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - STAGE - INTERIOR NIGHT The sets and the costumes are beautiful and very classic in their design. We see and hear the Love Duet of Act One in Violetta's sitting room. Violetta walks to the forefront of the stage, and the camera moves away from her, showing, seen from the stage, Edward and Vivian in their box. The picture and the music dissolve to the Second Act in Violetta's garden. Violetta is bending on Alfredo and singing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - BOX - INTERIOR NIGHT Low angle shot of the box. Vivian turns toward Edward, and then look back at the stage. Edward looks at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - STAGE - INTERIOR NIGHT Medium close shot on Violetta and Alfredo, in each other's arms. Violetta keeps on singing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - BOX - INTERIOR NIGHT Closer low angle shot on Edward an Vivian. The camera tilts up toward their faces.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - STAGE - INTERIOR NIGHT Violetta kisses Alfredo on the mouth, and then walks away. The music dissolves on the Final Scene of the Third Act, and the picture dissolves on :
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - BOX - INTERIOR NIGHT Medium close shot of Vivian and Edward. The camera moves closer to Vivian's face : she is crying. Close shot on Edward's face : he looks at Vivian. Back on Vivian's face, crying. Back on Edward's face. Medium close shot on their both faces, seen in profile from their right. Last orchestral notes and applauses.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voices over) Bravo ! Bravo ! Bravo ! Bravo ! Bravo ! Medium shot on Doris' box. Doris and her female friend are applauding, sitting in front of the balustrade. The two husbands are standing up behind them and also applauding. Back to Edward's box. Close shot of Vivian standing up. She still has tears in her eyes. She walks away from her seat, coming near Doris' box.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you enjoy the opera, dear ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, it was so good, I almost peed in my pants.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What ? She seems a bit surprised by what she just heard. Vivian walks away, and Edward turns toward Doris.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She said she liked it better than Pirates of Penzance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh ! Edward walks away, leaving a very pensive Doris. Apparently she doesn't completely believe Edward's translation of Vivian's words !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. Good-bye now. Still very pensive, Doris absently waves her hand to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Long shot from across the street. We see the limousine parking in front of the hotel. Medium long shot on the limousine parking. We hear Edward and Vivian's conversation in voices over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) No, don't touch..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) I moved the queen. I like the queen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) You can't move the queen. Vivian laughs, still in voice over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR NIGHT Vivian and Edward are seated on either side of a round table, playing chess. The room is very dimly lit, and there are two lit candles on the table. They are still wearing their opera clothes, but Edward has taken his jacket off. Slowly, the camera moves forward from an medium full shot of the table and the two characters on either side of it, to a close shot on the chess board.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you really do that ? Why don't we finish this tomorrow ? It's really late, and I have to work.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why don't you not go to work tomorrow. Take the day off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Me, not work ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I do own the company. The picture dissolves into :
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .A. - EXTERIOR DAY Aerial shot of Edward's office building. Actually there are two twins towers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .A. - PHILIP'S ROOM - INTERIOR DAY High angle shot on Philip's desk. Various documents are spread on the desk. But set above these documents, there is a miniature billiard table. And Philip is practicing his billiard with a miniature billiard cue. He makes a shot and then looks at a printed document lying next to the miniature table. He then moves a ball on the billiard table. A female secretary comes into view on the left of the screen. She is handing some documents to Philip.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here are the storage reports you wanted, and Mr. Lewis called. Philip doesn't take the documents and she puts them on the desk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What'd he say ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He said he's taking the day off. Philip looks very surprised.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's taking the day off ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's what he said. She walks away, leaving a very perplexed Philip.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - A PUBLIC PARK - EXTERIOR DAY A beautiful public park in L.A. A huge fountain with water works pouring gallons of water into the pool. Full shot of Edward and Vivian walking along the fountain, Vivian walking on a low wall, and Edward walking in the lane. Vivian is wearing a white dress with thin vertical stripes, and carrying a little black purse. Edward is wearing a very elegant grey suit, and he is carrying his leather briefcase.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm starving. There's a snap dog vendor over there. Do you have any money ? She jumps down from the low wall and takes Edward's arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have money. I don't know what a snap dog is, but I have money.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I'm gonna give, um... you'll buy a snap dog. We'll cop a squat under a tree somewhere.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cop a what ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cop a squat. Later on a lawn in the park. Medium close shot on a tartan red blanket spread on the lawn. Vivian is kneeling on the blanket, with Edward seated next to her. She has already taken one of Edward's shoes and socks off, and she is taking the other sock off. Edward is talking on his cellphone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right, read the first two pages. Medium full shot of the lawn. We see that Vivian and Edward are sitting under a tree. Vivian takes the other sock off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay... Mmm... Vivian stands up, and takes Edward's cellphone away from his ear, and shuts it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was talking to someone. The picture dissolves into :
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - A RIDING CLUB - EXTERIOR DAY A riding club with white fences around the riding lawn. Full shot of Vivian and Edward riding two horses. Edward is wearing an open black shirt, and a pair of slacks. Vivian is wearing riding pants and boots, a white shirt and a beige open sweater. Closer shot on Edward's face talking to Vivian while riding. Medium shot. The two horses are riding next to each other and Vivian is touching Edward's thigh. Medium close shot on Vivian. She is smiling and looking very happy. Long shot on the riding lawn. Edward and Vivian are walking next to each other, holding their respective horse by the reins. Closer shot on Edward and Vivian walking with their horses. The picture dissolve into :
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - A SMALL STREET - EXTERIOR NIGHT Full shot from across the street, looking into a small restaurant. In the window, neon signs say Good Food and Quick Grill. Edward and Vivian are seated at the bar. Closer shot on Edward and Vivian. Vivian is apparently explaining something to Edward with a lot of hand movements. The picture dissolves into :
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Edward and Vivian are seated next to each other inside the limousine. Edward is wearing a suit and a tie, and Vivian is wearing a purple dress.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you know that two of the Bach pieces that we heard tonight... were found by Felix Mendelssohn in a butcher's shop ? They were wrapping meat with the sheet music. Vivian is not listening to Edward and she keeps looking through the car window. She seems nervous.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's with you ? You're fidgeting. What's wrong ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Um... There's a club up here that I'd like to stop into for a second to see my roommate, if that's okay ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Absolutely. He raises his voice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Darryl !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, Darryl, can you just pull up into the back alleyway, please ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Full shot of the boulevard. The limousine slows down in front of The Blue Banana. There are several motorbikes parked in front of the club.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) The Blue Banana ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) The Blue Banana.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Very colorful life you lead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Medium full shot of a very dark alleyway. Strange-looking people are walking around. The limousine enters the alleyway and stops. Medium shot on two tough-looking guys looking at the limousine. Medium shot of the limousine. Vivian is already out of it, and Edward is coming out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You say this is a nice place. I'm sure it's a very nice place. He closes the door of the car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I just wanna run in for a minute and see if she's there, so just stay here. A quick shot on people exchanging things, maybe drugs. Back to the limousine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm hoping they don't spot this limousine as it is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll block it with my body. He leans on the limousine. Vivian walks away toward the entrance of the night club.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - MAIN ROOM - INTERIOR NIGHT We hear the song Fame 90, performed by David Bowie. Medium shot on a metal staircase, with a young man and a young woman standing at the bottom of the staircase. Medium shot of a couple dancing in front of the fresco. The whole club is bathed in red light. The camera starts panning to the left, showing more people dancing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fame makes a man who'll take things over. Fame Lets him loose and hard to swallow. Vivian enters the room, looking for Kit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fame puts you there where things are hollow. Customers start looking at Vivian, and at her elegant dress.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, Viv, you looking good, man. What'd you win, the lottery or what ? Vivian walks toward Rachel, one of the dancing girls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, Rachel, have you seen Kit ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, not since, uh, Tuesday. Hey, and Carlos is looking for her too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Hiya, honey, you look great. Vivian walks toward the bar and Pops, the bartender, standing behind it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi, Pops. Thanks. Have you seen Kit ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think she went to Santa Barbara. End of music.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Close shot of a skate board and a pair of roller-shoes, rolling on the alleyway ground. Medium full shot on the entrance of the club. Edward is standing facing the door. A group of tough-looking guys come behind him on rollers and skate-board. Edward turns around to face them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi. We hear the muffled sound of the music, coming from the club.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - MAIN ROOM - INTERIOR NIGHT We hear the music loud again. Medium shot of Vivian, still standing near the bar and facing Pops. She is writing something on a piece of paper.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here's my number where I'm gonna be for the rest of the week. Have her call me or come by, okay ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, honey. Thanks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks. She walks away from the bar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Muffled sound of the music coming from inside the night club.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fame, what you like is in the limo. Fame. Mediums shot of Vivian coming out of the club. On the door, a sign says I.D. Required. Vivian stops when she sees the strange crowd around Edward, then she starts walking again. She stops when she gets near Edward. Among the tough-looking guys around Edward, we recognize Carlos, still wearing his eternal hat, and another guy, one of Carlos' lieutenants, wearing a leather jacket, and holding a long stick in his hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's going on out here ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know. You left and all of a sudden I'm in the middle of West Side Story.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think you owe me some money, baby.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Two hundred dollars.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why don't you go to school tomorrow ? A girl, standing behind the group, starts giggling very stupidly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now I hear you got yourself a new job ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's just leave. She starts walking away, but Carlos puts himself in her way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You ain't going no place. Edward takes a step forward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey... The guy, standing next to Carlos, takes a very long knife out of his skateboard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're out of your neighborhood, home boy. This ain't no Beverly Hills !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't believe this. He has this knife coming out of his skateboard. He's going to stab me. He turns toward the guy with the stick.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you gonna do, you gonna strangle me with a Slinky ? The stupid girl giggles again. Carlos turns toward her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shut up !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right, okay, this is what's happening. You believe that this person owes you money, right, two hundred dollars ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's right.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because this is my block. Edward turns toward Vivian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: His block ?
direction.name: direction
