direction.raw_text: He's a drug dealer. It has to do with Kit. Let's just go, Edward. She starts walking away. But Carlos is in their way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Edward. So how's it feel to be a trick ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am not a trick. This is a trick. He points his hand toward Darry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Darryl ! Left pocket. Medium close shot on Darryl, standing near the limousine. He opens his jacket, revealing a holster with a gun inside. Back to the group around Vivian and Edward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Isn't that incredible ? And he does have a permit. Thank you, gentlemen. He pushes Vivian in front of him and crosses the group. He stops a couple of seconds near Carlos.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't you ever go near her again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Full shot on the limousine driving away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Does Darryl always carry a gun ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) When he drives me, yes, always. The picture dissolves into :
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - BEDROOM - INTERIOR NIGHT Through the open door of the bathroom, we see Vivian getting ready for the night. She is wearing a sleeveless nightdress. She releases her hair, which were tied in a bun, and walks out of the bathroom. She stops and looks at the bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He sleeps. Reverse close shot on Edward asleep half-sitting in the bed. He is bare-chested. Vivian walks between him and the camera. She sits down on the bed. Reverse close shot on Vivian's face. She is smiling. She gently kisses her index finger. Medium shot of Vivian and Edward. Vivian puts her finger on Edward's lips. She slowly bends down toward his face, and kisses him on the cheek, hesitates a second, then kisses him on the lips. He slowly wakes up, and blinks his eyes. He answers to Vivian's kisses. He raises up from the bed, kissing Vivian passionately. The camera moves around the bed, while the couple is lying on it, kissing passionately. Vivian removes her nightdress, and goes back kissing Edward. Later. The camera tilts down from the head of the bed. Edward is asleep, holding Vivian is his arm. She is still awake and smiling. She gently strokes his arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I love you. She closes her eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY Medium shot on Edward seated at the breakfast table. Edward is fully dressed, but without his jacket. He is eating breakfast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) What are you thinking about sitting here all by yourself ? Full shot on the breakfast table. Vivian is wearing a black nightgown with flowers printed on it. She is looking at the newspaper.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The fact that this will be our last night together, and you'll finally be rid of me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, you've been pretty tough to take. She sits down on a chair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My business is almost over, so I'll be going back to New York. Quick close shot on Vivian's face, who seems very pensive. Back to Edward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'd really like to see you again. Vivian smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You would ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. Yes, I would, so I've arranged for you to have an apartment, to have a car... Vivian's smiling face saddens a bit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...to have a wide variety of stores guaranteed to suck up to you anytime you want to go shopping. Everything's done. Vivian takes her head in her hand and bends down on the table. She exhales.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What else ? You gonna leave some money by the bed when you pass through town ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vivian, it really wouldn't be like that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How would it be ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, for one thing, it would get you off the streets.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's just geography. Vivian stands up and walks to the terrace.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - TERRACE - EXTERIOR DAY Medium full shot of Vivian walking out of the penthouse on the terrace. In the background, we see Edward still seated at the breakfast table. Vivian bends on the balustrade. Edward stands up, and walks toward Vivian. Slight low angle shot taken from outside the terrace, showing Vivian bending on the balustrade.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Vivian, what is it you want ? Medium close shot on Edward standing by the terrace door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you see happening between us ? Back to Vivian bending over the balustrade.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know. When I was a little girl, my mama used to lock me in the attic when I was bad, which was pretty often. And I would... I would pretend I was a princess... trapped in a tower by a wicked queen. Edward is seriously listening to Vivian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) And then suddenly this knight... Back to Vivian bending over the balustrade.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...on a white horse with these colors flying would come charging up and draw his sword. And I would wave. And he would climb up the tower and rescue me. She walks away from the balustrade and toward Edward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But never in all the time... that I had this dream did the knight say to me, Come on, baby, I'll put you up in a great condo. The phone rings inside the penthouse. After a couple of seconds, Edward walks into the penthouse, and picks up the phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. Vivian starts walking into the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over on the phone) I had to call.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - BATHROOM - INTERIOR DAY Medium shot of Philip, wearing a dark-colored bathrobe, and standing near the sink in his bathroom. On the counter next to the sink, a lot of bottles and jars : perfumes and cosmetics. Philip is calling from a wireless telephone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I just got off the phone with James Morse. Get this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - TERRACE - EXTERIOR DAY Back to the same scene, with Vivian standing near the terrace door, and looking a bit sad, and, in the background, in the living-room, Edward on the telephone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over on the phone) He wants to meet with you today.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What about ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over on the phone) He wouldn't say.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - BATHROOM - INTERIOR DAY Philip, the phone receiver stuck between his shoulder and his head, is drying his hands on a white towel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Edward, I think we got him. His nuts are on the block. We got him ! He slams his towel on the counter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - TERRACE - EXTERIOR DAY Same shot. We hear Philip's laugh on the phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over on the phone) Look, if he's really caving in, I want to get him to commit his stocks to us this afternoon. Hmm ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, it's no good. If he's really caving in, I don't want to wait until this afternoon. Have Morse meet me downtown this morning. Good-bye. He puts the phone down and grabs his jacket from a chair. He puts his jacket on while walking toward Vivian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have to go now, but I want you to understand... I heard everything you said. This is all I'm capable of right now. It's a very big step for me. She absently straightened his tie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know. It's a really good offer for a girl like me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've never treated you like a prostitute. He looks at her, then walks away toward the front door. Out of his hearing, Vivian whispers :
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You just did. We hear the front door closing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LOBBY - INTERIOR DAY Medium shot on the front desk. Miss Wilson, the receptionist, is standing behind the counter. She doesn't wear her large glasses, but she looks a bit worried. The camera slowly pans across the counter, and we discover Barney, the manager, talking on the phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's Barnard Thompson here, Miss Vivian. The camera keeps on panning and we discover Kit, chewing gum, and looking in a bad mood. On the top half of her body, she is only wearing a bra made into a fabric with a panther-skin motif
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Could you come down to the front desk ? There's someone here who wants to speak to you. She says her name is Miss De Luca... Kit extends her hand to take the phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let me talk to her. Let me... Let me just talk to her. Barney gives the phone to Kit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yo, Viv, babe. Would you come down here ? The sphincter police won't let me through. Okay. She gives the phone back to Barney.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's on her way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fine. An uniformed attendant walks to the counter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. Thompson. Barney turns toward him and Kit replaces the phone receiver on its hook.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The window washer is refusing to come down. The attendant walks away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a Saturday. Wait here, please. (to Miss Wilson) Watch her. Barney walks away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Yes, sir. Kit bends down on the counter polished surface and blows on it. Miss Wilson looks at her with a perplexed eye. Kit stands up and smiles to Miss Wilson. Further along the counter, a couple of middle-aged customers stare at her. She turns her face toward them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fifty bucks, Grandpa. For seventy-five, the wife can watch. The couple walks away. Miss Wilson looks at the leaving couple, then looks at Kit with a suppressed smile. Kit smiles back at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - SWIMMING POOL - EXTERIOR DAY Long shot on the swimming pool, seen from the terrace above the pool. A woman in bathing suit is coming up the stairs to the terrace, drying her daughter with a pink towel. Reverse medium shot on the stairs. Vivian and Kit are coming down the stairs. The mother and her daughter are coming up. Vivian is wearing a very elegant dark pink suit with a white shirt. Kit has put a grey denim jacket over her panther-decorated bra, but she is also wearing a very short and tight black skirt. Vivian has put her arm in the crook of Kit's elbow. The camera follows Kit and Vivian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Listen, I've been calling you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, I know. They told me at the Banana you were looking for me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You were supposed to come by Tuesday. I left the money at the desk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was hiding out from Carlos.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, if you picked up the money, you wouldn't have to hide.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, I was busy. I had a life, you know. Nino got beat up. We had to visit him in the hospital. Rachel got arrested. It was a mess. Anyway, I got the money. Kit waves the envelope with the money inside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you very much for saving my ass. Now Carlos can get off of it. Now the two girls have reached the bottom of the stair, and they are walking between the dinner tables surrounding the pool.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, he was talking about you last night. He would bust something if he saw you in this outfit. Reverse shot. The camera is a couple of yards in front of Vivian and Kit, and we see the two girls coming toward us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was afraid to hug you up there. I might wrinkle you ! Vivian lets go of Kit's arm and laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You look really good. Vivian points to a table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, something with shade. Vivian points to another table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You clean up real nice. You sure don't fit in down on the Boulevard looking like you do, not that you ever did. Kit sits down. Then Vivian also sits down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, thanks, but it's easy to clean up when you got money.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. So, when does he leave ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tomorrow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You get to keep the clothes ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. Edward asked me if I wanted to see him again. But I think... I think definitely no. I mean, it's just another week, right ? Kit has put her chewing gum into a teaspoon and she puts the spoon on the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Definitely no.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. Kits looks worried.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, no.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know this weepy look on your face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, no, you don't !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You fell in love with him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Kit, please. Stop it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've fallen in love with him ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kit !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you kiss him ? On the mouth ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, yeah, yeah... I did.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You kissed him on the mouth ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I did. It was nice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You fall in love with him, and you kiss him on the mouth. Did I not teach you anything ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, I'm not stupid, okay ? I'm... I'm not in love with him. I just... I like him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You like him ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You definitely like him. Well, he's not a bum. He's a rich, classy guy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who's gonna break my heart, right ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, no. Come on. You don't know that. Hey, he asked you, right ? Maybe you guys could, like, um, you know, get a house together. Like, buy some diamonds and a horse. I don't know. Vivian laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anyway, it could work. It happens.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When does it happen, Kit ? When does it really happen ? Who does it really work out for ? Did it work out for Skinny Marie or Rachel ? No !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Those were very specific cases of crackheads.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I just wanna know who it works out for. You give me one example of somebody that we know that it happened for.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Name someone ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, one person that it worked out for.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You want me to give you a name or something.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. I'd like to know. Kit presses her hands on her temples.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, God, the pressure of a name. She sighs and takes her hands out of her temples.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cinder-fucking-rella. Vivian laughs. Kit starts laughing too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .A. - EXTERIOR DAY The sidewalk in front of Edward's office building. Medium shot of Edward walking from the curb, carrying his briefcase. He climbs the stairs that reaches to the upper level of the sidewalk and the entrance of the building. He slows down when he hears a father talking to his son
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) If you do, I'll give you a piggy-back ride when you... See, I told you so... Not quick enough for the old man ! He laughs. Edward stops to look at him. Reverse shot on the father and his son. The father is wearing a dark-blue tracksuit with advertisements printed on it. The son, about ten year-old, is wearing a white shirt and beige slacks. The father is carrying a cheap briefcase. They are running around a lamp-post.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Winner gets a piggy-back. Come on, saddle up, boy. He bends down for his son to climb on his back. The son jumps on his back. The father sighs. Back on Edward, standing in the middle of the stairway, and looking at the father with a smile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Oh, Zachary ! Too many doughnuts. Father and son laugh. Edward starts walking again. Long shot on the large terrace in front of the building. Edward is crossing it toward the entrance. He slows down to give a last look the the father and his son.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .A. - MEETING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY Medium full shot on the long conference table. Edward is standing behind his chair at the end of the table, in front of the bay window. All the other ones are already seated. On Edward's right hand side, James Morse and then David Morse. On Edward's left hand side, Philip. The other seats are occupied by the various male assistants.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. Morse, you said this morning you wished to speak to Mr. Lewis. Mr. Lewis is now listening. Edward is pacing up and down in front of the bay window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've reconsidered my position on your acquisition offer... on one condition. I'm not so concerned about me, but the people who are working for me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's not a problem. They'll be taken care of. Well, then, gentlemen. If we could address ourselves to the contracts in front of you. If you look at... Edward hardly listens to what Philip says. He seems worried. He raises a hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me, Phil. Philip looks up at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gentlemen, I'd like to speak to Mr. Morse alone. Thank you. Philip seems surprised by what Edward just said. A bit reluctantly, he says :
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right, gentlemen, you heard the man. Please wait outside. All the assistants stand up to leave the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You too, Phil. Philip, still seated, looks up at Edward. He looks very surprised and chuckles nervously.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you mean ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I mean I would like to speak to Mr. Morse alone. Philip stands up and points toward David Morse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why does he get to stay ? James Morse makes a discreet sign to his grand-son to enjoin him to leave the room. Edward and Philip are standing, facing each other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please, please. Reluctantly, Philip starts moving away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll be right outside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good. Philip leaves the room, followed by David.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .A. - RECEPTION HALL - INTERIOR DAY Medium close shot on the door of the meeting room. David is leaving the room, and Philip closes the door behind him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .A. - MEETING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY Full shot. Edward is still standing in front of the bay window. He manipulates the control of the vertical Venetian blinds, to dim the daylight in the room. Close shot of James Morse looking at him questioningly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is that better ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's all right. Medium shot of Edward standing near the coffee table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Would you like a cup of coffee ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Black. Edward takes the coffee pot to pour the coffee. He sighs loudly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. Morse, my interests in your company have changed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is it you're after now, Mr. Lewis ? Edward brings the cup on the table in front of James.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I no longer wish to buy your company and take it apart. But I don't want anyone else to, either. And it is still extremely vulnerable. So I find myself... in unfamiliar territory. I want to help you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .A. - RECEPTION HALL - INTERIOR DAY Medium shot on the meeting room door. Philip and David are standing on either side of it. But they can't hear what is said inside the room. Philip gives a quick look at David and walks away toward the center of the hall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .A. - MEETING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY Full shot of the room. Edward is now seated in his chair facing James.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. Morse, I think we can do something very special with your company.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What about our Navy contracts ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, they weren't dead. Just delayed. I... bluffed a little bit. Medium shot of James, who chuckles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're very good at it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you very much. It's my job. He bends down and chuckles. Then he stands up from his chair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think we can leave the details up to the others. More slowly than Edward, James stands up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I find this hard to say without sounding condescending, but... I'm proud of you. He puts his hand on Edward's shoulder. Edward seems moved by this gesture.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you. I think we can let in the other suits now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .A. - RECEPTION HALL - INTERIOR DAY Close shot on Philip, standing behind the meeting room door, and sulking. Larger shot, showing all the assistants, seated, and David, standing on the other side of the door. Edward opens the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's continue the meeting. He goes back into the meeting room, followed by Philip, David and all the assistants. Through the open door, we see James Morse, standing at the back of the room, near Edward's chair. He motions to the men to sit down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come in, gentlemen. Sit down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .A. - MEETING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY Medium shot of Philip coming into the room. Edward is smiling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Edward, please, what was this all about ? Hmm ? Edward slaps him on the arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's all yours, Phil. Finish it up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .A. - RECEPTION HALL - INTERIOR DAY Medium close shot on the door of the meeting room. Edward is coming out. Before he closes the door, we see Philip bending down on the table to look at the documents.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over, heard through the door) Hold it. Hold it. These aren't signed ! These aren't signed ! Could someone please tell me what the fuck is going on here ? Larger shot. Edward, with a broad smile on his face, walks away from the door carrying his briefcase.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over, heard through the door) Mr. Lewis and I are going to build ships together.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .A. - MEETING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY Close shot on James Morse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Great big ships. Close shot on Philip. He doesn't look very happy about this unexpected situation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .A. - EXTERIOR DAY Medium full shot on the limousine parked on the curb in front of the building. Darryl is standing near the car. Edward gives his briefcase to Darryl.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, I think I'm gonna go for a walk. Just stay here for a while. I'll be back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, sir, Mr. Lewis. Darryl sits down on the hood of the car, holding the briefcase in his arms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - A PUBLIC PARK - EXTERIOR DAY Close shot on Edward's head and shoulders, walking up and down in the park. Medium full shot, showing Edward's full body. He has taken his shoes and socks off, and he is holding them in his hand. He is walking up and down barefoot in the grass. Close Up shot on Edward's bare feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY Close shot on Vivian's bare feet walking on the rug. The door bell is chiming. Vivian puts down a large hat box on the floor, and she walks to the front door. The camera tilts up and we see her full body. She is wearing the same dark pink suit she was wearing when she was with Kit by the swimming-pool. She opens the door to Philip. Close up shot on Vivian's face : she doesn't seem very happy to see Philip. Reverse shot on Philip, a strange sneer on his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, well. Hello again. I'm looking for Edward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Edward's not here. I thought he was with you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Uh, Edward is definitely not with me. He walks in without waiting for Vivian to invite him in. He chuckles. Vivian closes the front door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, if Edward were with me... He puts his briefcase down on the floor and walks into the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When. Actually, when... Edward was with me, he didn't blow off billion dollar deals ! He walks to the bar and helps himself for a drink.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think that, uh, Edward's with you. That's what I think. Mind if I have a drink ? He pours whisky in a glass without waiting for Vivian's answer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. He holds the glass toward her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, thank you. She walks away from him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I'll just wait. She sits down on the sofa, crosses her legs on the couch and starts writing in a notebook. Behind him, Philip sits down on a stool near the bar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, Edward will be back soon. Any minute, he'll be home. Medium shot on Philip at the bar. He stands up and slowly walks toward her. The camera follows him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know... (HE CHUCKLES) ...this is not home. This is, uh, a hotel room. And, uh, you are not... the little woman. He sits down on the sofa, next to Vivian. She uncrosses her legs and lets them down on the floor. He puts his glass on the low table, crosses his fingers and snickers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're a hooker. Maybe you're a very good hooker, you know ? She puts her notebook on the low table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe if I do you, then I wouldn't care about losing millions of dollars. Because I have to be very honest with you right now, Vivian. He moves slightly closer to her. She seems very tense by the situation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right now I really do care. I really do. And right now I am really pissed, you know ? He moves his hand toward her bare leg. She glares at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right now I am just freaking out. So maybe if I screw you, huh... He puts his hand between her legs. She moves it away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...and take you to the opera, then I could be a happy guy, just like Edward. He keeps on trying to fondle her, and Vivian keeps on trying to get rid of him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, get off me ! They start fighting. He stands up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, hey ! Goddamn it ! She bites his hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ow ! He slaps her face very hard. She falls down on the floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ow ! He kneels down beside her and grabs her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on ! Come on ! I'll pay for it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get off me ! Ow ! Get off me !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How much is it ? Twenty bucks, thirty bucks ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get off me ! Get off me !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fifty ? You a fifty dollars whore, Vivian ? Edward, who has come silently into the room, grabs him from behind, and forces him to stand up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doing ? Get off ! Quick shot on Vivian slowly getting up from the floor. Back on Philip and Edward fighting.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop. I don't want to hurt you ! Stop it !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know how to tell you this. You already did, Edward ! Edward pushes him toward the front door, which is still open.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right, all right.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Out. Out of here. Philip falls down on the floor. He slowly stands back up
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, she's a whore, man. She's a goddamn... Aah ! Edward very violently punches him in the face. Philip falls down on the floor. Quick shot on Vivian, seated on the sofa. She starts when she sees Edward punching Philip. Philip slowly stands up, his hand on his face. Edward looks at his hand, who seems to hurt him after the violent punch he gave to Philip.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aah ! Damn. Shit. Goddamn ! He picks up Philip's briefcase and throws it through the open door. It falls on the floor of the hallway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think you broke my nose.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get out of here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is wrong with you ? Come on, Edward ! I gave you ten years ! I devoted my whole life to you !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's bullshit. This is such bullshit ! It's the kill you love, not me ! I made you a very rich man doing exactly what you loved. Now get out of here ! (YELLING) Get out ! Philip, subdued, walks slowly out. Quick shot on Vivian, still seated on the sofa, and still very moved by what just happened. Back to Edward, slamming the door behind Philip. He looks very upset. Later. Close up on a box full of ice cubes. One of Edward's hands is taking the cubes out of the box. The other hand, the one which hit Philip, is wrapped in a white napkin. He puts the cubes in another white napkin and wraps the napkin around the cubes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Why do guys always know how to hit a woman right across the cheek ? Close up on Vivian's face. She is touching her red cheek.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wham ! And it feels like your eye is gonna explode. What do they do ? Do they pull you aside in high school and show you how to do this ? We see Edward's hand holding the napkin with the ice inside. He puts it on Vivian's cheek.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is that... Ow ! Even the light touch of the napkin seems to hurt her. The camera moves slowly away, widening the shot, and showing Edward in shirtsleeves bending over Vivian, without her jacket, and lying on the sofa.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not all guys hit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I heard about what you did with Morse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That was a business decision.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was good.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It felt good.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think this is okay. She moves his hand away, and slowly sits up in the sofa.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I gotta get going.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, I noticed you're packed. Why are you leaving now ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Edward, there'll always be some guy, even some friend of yours, thinking he can treat me like Stuckey, thinking that it's allowed. What are you gonna do ? You gonna beat up everybody ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's not why you're leaving. She stands up from the sofa. Full shot on the sofa, with Vivian standing up and Edward still seated.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, you made me a really nice offer. And a few months ago, no problem. But now everything is different, and you've changed that. And you can't change back. I want more. Edward stands up from the sofa.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know about wanting more. I invented the concept. The question is how much more.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want the fairy tale.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Impossible relationships. Vivian has put her jacket back on and she is putting her shoes on, seated on the step that goes across the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My special gift is impossible relationships. Full shot on the room. Edward has taken his wallet, and he is taking money out of it. He throws the wallet on a table and sits down on the steps next to Vivian. Medium shot on the steps. Edward gives the money to Vivian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're welcome. She puts the money in the pocket of her jacket. He is holding a business card in his hand. If you ever need anything... dental floss, whatever... you give me a call. They both chuckle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I had a good time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Me too. She stands up from the steps, and starts collecting her luggage. Edward, who had remained seated on the steps, stands up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you want me to get you a bellboy ? She is putting the garment bags on her arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I got it. He bends down to pick up a bag.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll carry this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks. She starts moving toward the front door. He walks ahead of her and starts opening the door, then closes it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stay. Stay the night with me. And not because I'm paying you, but because you want to.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't. She seems very sad. She opens the door. He holds it for her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good-bye. She starts moving out, then stops and smiles to him
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think you have a lot of special gifts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mmm. Edward closes the door without looking at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LOBBY - INTERIOR DAY Close shot on the marbled floor. There is a black spot on it. Barney and an uniformed attendant are kneeling on either side of the black spot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't do it, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, no. Now, I didn't say that. I want you to call maintenance and have them deal with this. You must delegate authority. Vivian's legs walk in and stop between the two men.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi, Barney. The camera tilts up and we see the faces of all of those three people. The two men stand up
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Miss Vivian. The attendant doesn't move away and looks at Vivian with a light smile. Barney looks at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you. The attendant walks away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wanted to say good-bye.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, then, I gather you're not accompanying Mr. Lewis to New York.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, Barney. You and me live in the real world... most of the time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Have you arranged for transportation ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm gonna call a cab.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Allow me. He points to Darryl, whom we don't see, and calls him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Darryl.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Yes, sir. Darryl walks near Vivian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please take Miss Vivian anywhere she wishes to go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, sir. Darry walks away. Vivian holds her hand out to Barney. Barney bends down and lightly kisses the extended hand. Then he shakes it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's been a pleasure knowing you. Come and visit us again sometime.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stay cool. She slaps him on the arm and walks away. Barney turns around and looks at her walking away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Full shot on the limousine driving away from the curb in front of the hotel. We hear the song It Must Have Been Love, performed by Roxette.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Medium shot of Vivian seated in the back of the limousine, looking very pensive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lay a whisper On my pillow. Leave the winter On the ground. Vivian turns around to have a last look at the hotel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wake up lonely... Vivian turns back and look absently in front of her, with the same pensive, slightly sad, look on her face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...The stare of silence In the bedroom And all around. Touch me now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Full shot on the limousine driving along the street.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I close my eyes And dream away. The scene dissolves into :
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - TERRACE - EXTERIOR EVENING Medium shot taken from outside the terrace, of Edward standing near the balustrade. His vest is open and he has taken his tie off. He tries to look over the balustrade, but can't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It must have been love, But it's over now. It must have been good... He walks away from the balustrade, and back into the penthouse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...But I lost it somehow. It must have been love, But it's over now. The camera lets Edward go inside the penthouse and pans to the right along the wall and the foliage decorating the terrace. The picture dissolves into the foliage on the other side of the French window and :
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - TERRACE - EXTERIOR DAY Next day.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: From the moment we touched, Till the time had run out. The camera pans to the left from the foliage to a medium shot on the window. Edward comes out on the terrace. He is fully dressed in an elegant grey suit. The camera follows Edward. We hear some thunder rumbling in the distance. Edward moves to the balustrade. He is holding a jewel case in his hand. It is the one with Vivian's necklace inside. A bell boy is coming out on the terrace. He has some luggage in his hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is that everything, sir ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. Yes, that's everything.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll meet you downstairs, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you. The bell boy walks away from the terrace, carrying luggage. More thunder and end of the music.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY Close shot on kit, seen through the window. It's raining. She is holding a picture of her and Vivian. She chuckles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We look so dopey. Medium shot inside the room. Kit is seated near the window, holding a Teddy Bear on her laps. She stands up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: San Francisco's not that great, you know. She walks toward Vivian, who is wearing slacks, a white T-shirt and a dark jacket. Her hair is tied into a bun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's bad climate. It's foggy. It's unpredictable. The camera moves back into a full shot of the room. Vivian is putting things away in a bag.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll wear a sweater.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you gonna do there ? She sits down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get a job. Finish high school. I got things I can do. I used to make pretty good grades in high school.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, I could see that about you. I could see that. She turns around to face Kit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure you won't come with me ? Kit looks around her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And leave all this ? Not in a million. She laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come here. Kit stands up, puts the Teddy Bear down, and walks toward her. Vivian takes some money out of her pocket. She puts the money in the breast pocket of Kit's denim jacket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa. Whoa. What is this ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's part of the Edward Lewis scholarship fund. We think you got a lot of potential, Kit De Luca.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You do ? You think I got potential ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, yeah. Don't let anybody tell you different, okay ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. Vivian is crying.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take care of you. She puts a cap on Kit's head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I can't, I can't. It's your favorite. She takes it off and gives it back to Vivian. She walks away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What time's your bus ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An hour.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, well, I gotta split, 'cause good-byes make me crazy. So, take care of you. She hugs Vivian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa. Vivian slaps Kit's back, and then kisses her on the head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LOBBY - INTERIOR DAY Medium shot from behind the front desk. Barney is behind the counter, working on some paperwork. Miss Wilson is standing besides him, with her large glasses back on her nose. Edward walks to the desk. Barney smiles to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. Lewis.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't have any messages for me, do you ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I'm afraid not, sir. Edward starts signing some documents on the counter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll need a car to the airport also.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course. Darryl will take you wherever you need to go. Darryl walks to the desk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Darryl, the limousine out front, please ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you, Darryl. Darryl walks away. Edward pushes the signed documents across the counter to Barney.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One last thing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. Edward gives the jewel box to Barney.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you could possibly return this to Fred's for me, please.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, of course. May I, sir ? Edward chuckles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course, please. Barney opens the jewel box. Close up on the necklace in the box. It is the one Vivian was wearing at the Opera. Close shot on Edward looking at the necklace with a sad face. Then medium close shot on Barney, with a half-smile on his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It must be difficult to let go of something so beautiful. Close up shot on the jewel box being closed by Barney. Back to Barney.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, Darryl also drove Miss Vivian home yesterday. Edward doesn't answer, but his face indicates he has taken the information in. Back to Barney.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll take care of it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you, Mr. Thompson. Edward walks away, followed by the bell boy carrying his luggage. Barney looks at him with a puzzled eye.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Medium shot of Edward seated in the back of the limousine. He has an absent look on his face. It is raining outside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over, from the driver's seat) Your plane is leaving as scheduled, sir, and you should be back in New York on time. Edward gives Darryl a quick look, then look absently through the window. He must think about something that makes him smile a little.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY Vivian is also looking absently through the window of her hotel room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Medium shot on a fast food stand on the street. Kit is standing in front of the stand, talking to Angel, another prostitute whom we have already briefly seen early in the film in the Blue Banana Club. She is drinking Coca-Cola from a paper tumbler.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm gonna have to charge you a little more rent than Vivian... because I've got this beauty course I'm looking into. I'm not gonna be there that much, you know ? Full shot showing the whole sidewalk with the food stand in the middle. On the right of the food stand, a very small temporary flower stand in front of a closed shop. While Kit keeps on talking to her prospective roommate, Edward walks behind them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 'Cause you can't... You just can't turn tricks forever. You gotta have a goal. Do you have a goal ? Closer shot on the flower stand and the florist, a middle-aged woman. Edward has just reached the stand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Well, I always wanted to be in the Ice Capades. Edward is looking at the flowers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Help you, love ? Edward points to a bunch of flowers. The florist gives it to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There you go. Thank you very much. He gives her money, takes the flowers and puts his wallet back into his jacket inside pocket. He walks away. Back to Kit and Angel at the food stand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, you got a lot of stuff you gotta move in ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, Carlos burned most of my stuff when I said I was moving out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY Medium full shot. Vivian is putting her handbag on her shoulder, getting ready to move out of the room. She has already reached the front door, when she hears a car honking repeatedly. She stops and slowly turns around. We hear music from La Traviata, a soprano solo. Vivian drops the bag and walks toward the window. The music gets louder and Vivian has a broad smile. She walks to the window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: High angle shot of the street, as seen from Vivian's hotel window. The limousine is slowly driving toward the hotel. The roof of the limousine is open, and the upper half of Edward's body is showing through the open roof. He has the flowers in one hand and a black umbrella in the other hand. The car is honking and moves closer to the curb. The car stops in front of the hotel. Edward raises one arm, the one with the umbrella.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vivian ! Close shot on the window. Vivian is laughing, but also ready to cry. High angle view of the roof of the car. Edward is waving both his umbrella and his flowers. Darryl is coming out of the driver's door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vivian ! Back to Vivian, waving to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING ROOM - INTERIOR DAY Vivian leaves the window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over) Princess Vivian ! Come down ! Vivian walks to another window, the one leading to the emergency exit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: High angle shot of the limousine. Edward comes out of the car through the roof and jumps on the sidewalk. Darryl, standing near the car, watches the scene and smiles. Medium close shot on the balcony of the emergency exit. Vivian has come out of the room, and is smiling and looking down at Edward. Medium close shot of Edward, standing on the sidewalk and looking up at Vivian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Had to be the top floor, right ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over, from the top of the building) It's the best. High angle shot of the emergency exit, seen from Vivian's balcony. We see Edward through the metal steps leading to Vivian's level.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right. I'm coming up. Back on the sidewalk level of the emergency exit. Edward grabs the emergency ladder with the hook of his umbrella, and brings it down. Back on Vivian's balcony. She unties her hair, an lets it wave down. Medium shot on the emergency exit. Edward is slowly climbing the steps, with the flowers between his teeth. Back to Vivian, looking down and smiling broadly. Back to Edward on a landing of the emergency exit. He crawls on it, with his back pressed against the wall. Close shot on Edward's face, with the flowers between his teeth. He stops moving and looks down. High angle shot on the limousine, and Darryl, smiling encouragingly to Edward. Back to Edward's close shot. He resumes his crawling walk with his back pressed against the wall. Larger shot on the emergency exit landing. Edward reaches the ladder leading to Vivian's landing, whose shadow we see moving above Edward. Low angle shot on Vivian's balcony. She walks on it to meet Edward. High angle shot, seen from Vivian's eyes, and showing Edward walking up the last steps, holding the bannister very firmly. Low angle shot on Vivian, standing on the top of the steps, laughing and looking down at Edward. Back to Edward, who lets go of the bannister, and opens his arms to Vivian. Close shot on Vivian walking down the steps. She reaches Edward, who climbs another step to be at her level. Their faces are now close to one another.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So what happened after he climbed up the tower and rescued her ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She rescues him right back. Slowly, their mouth meet, and they kiss passionately. Full shot of Vivian's hotel and the emergency exit. On the steps between the top landing and the one below, we see Edward and Vivian kissing passionately. End of La Traviata music. We hear the voice of the Afro-American man we saw at the beginning of the film, crossing Hollywood Boulevard.
direction.name: direction
